cobblemon.species.glacicrawl.name: Glacicrawl
cobblemon.species.glacicrawl.desc: It captures its food by freezing it with blasts of liquid nitrogen. Because it's totally blind, it detects movement with a thin net of ice along the ground.
cobblemon.species.velvedrake.name: Velvedrake
cobblemon.species.velvedrake.desc: This Pokemon's body is cold enough to quickly lower a room's temperature to freezing. It constantly shoots blasts of ice out of its shoulder vents.
cobblemon.species.enigmore.name: Enigmore
cobblemon.species.enigmore.desc: Schools of Enigmore dig for food with their clawed snouts. Its fossils, found in ancient shales, are among the oldest of all Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.oculustrous.name: Oculustrous
cobblemon.species.oculustrous.desc: It is thought to be the first creature to have evolved advanced intelligence, and that its psychic eye foretold its species' extinction.
cobblemon.species.remainstone.name: Remainstone
cobblemon.species.remainstone.desc: An attempted reconstruction from several shattered fossils resulted in this strange new Pokemon. It sometimes acts as though it is tethered between multiple different realities. (Resurrected from Broken Fossil)
cobblemon.species.broogah.name: Broogah
cobblemon.species.broogah.desc: An ancient Pokemon that builds tools and armor from stone. Though they have a tough and rugged exterior, they're known to be quite compassionate and cooperative among each other.
cobblemon.species.platoul.name: Platoul
cobblemon.species.platoul.desc: It wears a piece of metal like a mask to shield its face. Historically, Platoul wore discarded shields and armor, though modern Platoul are often found holding on to pieces of scrap metal instead.
cobblemon.species.victorelic.name: Victorelic
cobblemon.species.victorelic.desc: Victorelic frequently appear in the aftermath of a great catastrophe, salvaging the armor from fallen warriors and wearing it as a shell. At a glance, this Pokemon is sometimes mistaken for a loved one returned from the grave.
cobblemon.species.batellite.name: Batellite
cobblemon.species.batellite.desc: A spacefaring Pokemon that sleeps in the planet's orbit and enters the atmosphere to feed. If a manmade object in space suddenly breaks out of orbit, a jealous Batellite is likely to blame.
cobblemon.species.purrth.name: Purrth
cobblemon.species.purrth.desc: With its pair of beaks, it will deliver a vicious nip if handled. It takes a very skilled trainer to earn the trust of this skittish Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.terrachnid.name: Terrachnid
cobblemon.species.terrachnid.desc: It is able to maneuver easily across rough terrain as it stalks its prey, even able to walk on walls and ceilings to ambush an unsuspecting target.
cobblemon.species.miserachnid.name: Miserachnid
cobblemon.species.miserachnid.desc: It's told of in storybooks where it is a feared devourer of humans, and is hunted by a vengeful warrior who must slay it in its cavernous lair.
cobblemon.species.messoul.name: Messoul
cobblemon.species.messoul.desc: It came from a meteor that passed through a cloud of smog. Very large ones can be found near major cities and highways, gorging on the exhaust fumes of cars.
cobblemon.species.wastenaut.name: Wastenaut
cobblemon.species.wastenaut.desc: The interior of its tough skin is filled with toxic slime. It sucks up as much poison as it can hold, then explosively releases it all.
cobblemon.species.celestar.name: Celestar
cobblemon.species.celestar.desc: This Pokemon drifts through the upper atmosphere in large groups. It is made of a dense material not common on Earth.
cobblemon.species.celestroid.name: Celestroid
cobblemon.species.celestroid.desc: As Celestroid moves, it leaves behind a very long and bright trail of light. It is common practice in many parts of the world to wish upon a Celestroid as it flies overhead.
cobblemon.species.ufi.name: UFI
cobblemon.species.ufi.desc: An unidentified infantile Pokemon, from beyond the visible universe. It has taken up residence in the Oort Cloud.
cobblemon.species.wogglejr.name: Woggle Jr.
cobblemon.species.wogglejr.desc: (Grease type.) Woggle Jr. communities live a secluded life away from all other Pokemon. It is difficult to find one away from its family.
cobblemon.species.plantis.name: Plantis
cobblemon.species.plantis.desc: Their parents lay their eggs in the canopy of jungles, where they blend in. They make a high-pitched chirping noise so their parents can find them afterwards.
cobblemon.species.ensencoon.name: Ensencoon
cobblemon.species.ensencoon.desc: Despite being a cocoon, it is capable of limited movement. Air blowing through its shell's pores produces a flute-like sound.
cobblemon.species.vivantis.name: Vivantis
cobblemon.species.vivantis.desc: Its two massive claws are completely hollow. The sound they make as air flows through them stimulates plant life around it.
cobblemon.species.blastpole.name: Blastpole
cobblemon.species.blastpole.desc: It can blow fire out of a pore in its backside, propelling it through the air. The fire is fueled by toxins inside its body.
cobblemon.species.wogfire.name: Wogfire
cobblemon.species.wogfire.desc: The pores in its back lead to a sac of flammable, corrosive liquid. When Wogfire takes a blow, the liquid is forced out.
cobblemon.species.pyroad.name: Pyroad
cobblemon.species.pyroad.desc: Where Pyroad roams, it is revered as king. The thunderous croaks it lets out strikes fear in the hearts of any Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.aqualisk.name: Aqualisk
cobblemon.species.aqualisk.desc: Its paws are adhesive, which allow Aqualisk to climb both on walls and on the surface of water. It dives down when it is over a fish Pokemon to catch it.
cobblemon.species.pearlizz.name: Pearlizz
cobblemon.species.pearlizz.desc: It is impossible to separate it from the pearl it holds fiercely. When it has to move, it simply rolls the pearl along with it.
cobblemon.species.reptide.name: Reptide
cobblemon.species.reptide.desc: It is manipulative, commanding fish Pokemon to work as toadies for it. The pearls adorning its body focus its psychic energy into powerful beams.
cobblemon.species.whipcrat.name: Whipcrat
cobblemon.species.whipcrat.desc: Its tail always has a lot of tension held inside it. When threatened, it whips using its tail, releasing all the tension at once.
cobblemon.species.ratonine.name: Ratonine
cobblemon.species.ratonine.desc: Its tail splits into several prehensile whips. It also has a cruel fighting style; other Fighting-types don't like being associated with it.
cobblemon.species.hogspur.name: Hogspur
cobblemon.species.hogspur.desc: The fur on its back condenses into thick spikes that it uses for protection. When in danger, it curls up to become a spiked ball and rolls into the attacker.
cobblemon.species.knucquill.name: Knucquill
cobblemon.species.knucquill.desc: The spikes on its knuckles are unbreakable. A single punch can easily gouge its enemy's vital areas.
cobblemon.species.raddash.name: Raddash
cobblemon.species.raddash.desc: It lives its live underground near clear bodies of water, only its leaves showing. If uprooted, it will retaliate with a flurry of kicks before running off at high speeds.
cobblemon.species.parceps.name: Parceps
cobblemon.species.parceps.desc: It takes pride in the musculature of its immensely powerful legs. If another Parceps enters its territory, they have a 'pose-off', the loser being exiled from the area.
cobblemon.species.plastree.name: Plastree
cobblemon.species.plastree.desc: Its glossy body resembles a small plant. In barren wastelands and desert, they gather in great numbers pretending to be grass.
cobblemon.species.forestic.name: Forestic
cobblemon.species.forestic.desc: It is comfortable in the sand or floating above the water. They are known to ferry people from island to island.
cobblemon.species.chemito.name: Chemito
cobblemon.species.chemito.desc: Their abdomen contains dangerous chemicals that leach into the blood it drinks. It will only attack with it if absolutely necessary.
cobblemon.species.cyanidae.name: Cyanidae
cobblemon.species.cyanidae.desc: Cyanidae venom is potent enough to knock out a Thermedary. They lance their prey and slurp up blood in under a second.
cobblemon.species.bagly.name: Bagly
cobblemon.species.bagly.desc: It's face is supposedly so ugly it keeps itself hidden under a paper bag. It can commonly be seen around Poke Marts, scouring the dumpsters.
cobblemon.species.haggage.name: Haggage
cobblemon.species.haggage.desc: The bag mask around its head fits so tight it'd take a tow truck to pull it off. Anyone who sees its unmasked face is said to turn to dust.
cobblemon.species.pooyo.name: Pooyo
cobblemon.species.pooyo.desc: It's body is made mostly of extremely fertile soil. Wherever it roams, plants always grow behind it.
cobblemon.species.poogurt.name: Poogurt
cobblemon.species.poogurt.desc: As it eats a mostly herbivorous diet, they fiercely guard whatever crops they end up growing. Trained ones can replenish a farm in mere hours.
cobblemon.species.poolem.name: Poolem
cobblemon.species.poolem.desc: It drips soil infront of it which is flattened into neatly organized rows by it's rolling pin shaped arms. Anything that attacks it's farm is composted into the soil beneath it.
cobblemon.species.bulberry.name: Bulberry
cobblemon.species.bulberry.desc: The bulb on its backside attracts bugs at night. When the bugs touch the bulb, it electrocutes them and they are promptly eaten.
cobblemon.species.florascent.name: Florascent
cobblemon.species.florascent.desc: Its tongue can glow as bright as the sun when it's angry. They used to illuminate the lush jungles here, but deforestation and pollution drove them off.
cobblemon.species.gumuppi.name: Gumuppi
cobblemon.species.gumuppi.desc: Genetically engineered in a lab to sell as pets, but they managed to thrive in the wild once released. They are blind, and adept at smelling each other's blood.
cobblemon.species.finbred.name: Finbred
cobblemon.species.finbred.desc: Its diet consists mostly of other Gumuppi, which it hunts by smell. Dissection reveals that it actually does have eyes; its own skull has grown over them.
cobblemon.species.tangrue.name: Tangrue
cobblemon.species.tangrue.desc: Its tail has sharp spikes on the backside, which it curls into a leg-sized snare. It clamps shut as soon as its prey steps on it, allowing it to feed with ease.
cobblemon.species.hangrove.name: Hangrove
cobblemon.species.hangrove.desc: It hides in a tree, coils of its body hanging low to create a deadly trap. The spikes on its back have a thin hole at the tip it uses to drain the blood of anything that falls onto it.
cobblemon.species.eggue.name: Eggue
cobblemon.species.eggue.desc: It is a bird Pokemon's worst nightmare to find their eggs replaced with Eggue. Anything pulled into its shell is impossible to get back.
cobblemon.species.vomelet.name: Vomelet
cobblemon.species.vomelet.desc: Its shell is a foot thick and harder than stone. Its courtship ritual involves rolling into each other at ludicrous speed until one of them cracks.
cobblemon.species.crawjabby.name: Crawjabby
cobblemon.species.crawjabby.desc: Crawjabby are aquatic Pokemon that take pride in their fists. They live in solitude, engaging other Crawjabby in violent boxing matches.
cobblemon.species.lobbercut.name: Lobbercut
cobblemon.species.lobbercut.desc: What Lobbercut lacks in brains or brawn, it makes up for in confidence. It will continue to fight onwards no matter how hard the odds are stacked against it.
cobblemon.species.elekrab.name: Elekrab
cobblemon.species.elekrab.desc: It has two anemone Pokemon attached to its otherwise unimpressive claws. The anemones protect Elekrab with their paralyzing sting.
cobblemon.species.krustinger.name: Krustinger
cobblemon.species.krustinger.desc: Its anemone symbiotes have evolved, growing across its carapace as well. When it punches, it aims for the opponent's chest to stop their heart.
cobblemon.species.sakaline.name: Sakaline
cobblemon.species.sakaline.desc: It lives in polluted lakes. Poisonous water that flows through it exits clean and fresh enough to drink.
cobblemon.species.amoebolt.name: Amoebolt
cobblemon.species.amoebolt.desc: Pollutants processed by its cytoplasm are converted into electrical energy. This makes it one of the most versatile Pokemon when it comes to environmental preservation, being both a reliable source of renewable energy and a cleaner of oceanic pollution.
cobblemon.species.dumpchin.name: Dumpchin
cobblemon.species.dumpchin.desc: Decades ago, they were covered in sharp bristles. Nowadays, their skin is simply covered by a firm, but fuzzy mantle.
cobblemon.species.urchimpale.name: Urchimpale
cobblemon.species.urchimpale.desc: It gathers sharp trash and metal scrap and glues it onto its body using sludge and mud. The poison it naturally produces adds to the already dangerous rust on the metal it collects.
cobblemon.species.schwincer.name: Schwincer
cobblemon.species.schwincer.desc: An infamous kleptomaniac. Their claws are especially adept at gripping onto anything metal. Some people have become lost exploring their burrows, trying to strike it rich.
cobblemon.species.cleame.name: Cleame
cobblemon.species.cleame.desc: Notoriously easy to provoke and even easier to offend. When something upsets it greatly, steam puffs from holes on its shell.
cobblemon.species.furiousc.name: Furiousc
cobblemon.species.furiousc.desc: Its blood is so hot it begins to boil, heating the water around it. So much steam builds up in its shell that it creates a violent explosion when it releases it all.
cobblemon.species.clambat.name: Clambat
cobblemon.species.clambat.desc: Its long tongue is pure, densely packed muscle. It punches holes in the tidepool rocks to build its home inside of.
cobblemon.species.mussuplex.name: Mussuplex
cobblemon.species.mussuplex.desc: It has two tongues, one for attacking and the other for breathing. It can take in water to bulk up its dominant tongue even larger.
cobblemon.species.maptus.name: Maptus
cobblemon.species.maptus.desc: The sign attached to its tail is actually part of its body. It is covered in sharp spines which it uses to ambush bug Pokemon, its prey.
cobblemon.species.diverguare.name: Diverguare
cobblemon.species.diverguare.desc: It slowly crawls in one direction for days on end; whenever it changes direction, it grows a new spine. Old ones are covered in sharp spikes.
cobblemon.species.fungusite.name: Fungusite
cobblemon.species.fungusite.desc: This Pokemon controls its host's every move. It uses its disguise to enter its host's habitat unnoticed and spread itself to other Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.controll.name: Controll
cobblemon.species.controll.desc: It lives and hides under bridges and other man-made structures. When a person or Pokemon approaches, it sprays them with toxic spores.
cobblemon.species.decomposite.name: Decomposite
cobblemon.species.decomposite.desc: Anything grabbed by its tentacles is instantly bended to its will. The husks of former hosts are arranged in its lair like trophies.
cobblemon.species.dubalae.name: Dubalae
cobblemon.species.dubalae.desc: Its thin shell holds an alkaline material which it uses to produce electricity. Wrapping a cord around its leg will transfer its electrical energy to any device.
cobblemon.species.batterode.name: Batterode
cobblemon.species.batterode.desc: It has grown too big for its shell, breaking it apart. The flaky substance making up its body is corrosive enough to burn through lead.
cobblemon.species.camelt.name: Camelt
cobblemon.species.camelt.desc: Its hump is full of water, which is constantly boiling from its body heat. Contracting its hump allows it to erupt boiling water everywhere.
cobblemon.species.thermedary.name: Thermedary
cobblemon.species.thermedary.desc: One of the most important species in southern Enriko. Travelers will use Camboil's hump to boil food in. It can even be used as a mobile hot spring.
cobblemon.species.womblock.name: Womblock
cobblemon.species.womblock.desc: They chew rocks into perfect cubes with their teeth and use the bricks to build shelter. It is believed they inspired the invention of bricks and mortar.
cobblemon.species.harihary.name: Harihary
cobblemon.species.harihary.desc: An extremely elusive Pokemon that supposedly only lives deep in the darkest woods. Anybody who claims to have seen one also claims it disappeared in a puff of scraggly hairs upon capture.
cobblemon.species.wigfoot.name: Wigfoot
cobblemon.species.wigfoot.desc: It stomps around the deepest forests in Enriko, leaving huge footprints and a trail of hair behind it. Its fur goes for a fortune in certain markets.
cobblemon.species.fleesquach.name: Fleesquach
cobblemon.species.fleesquach.desc: The only evidence of Fleesquach existing is a blurry video taken decades ago. Other cases of Fleesquach sightings are quickly laughed off or ignored.
cobblemon.species.conkid.name: Conkid
cobblemon.species.conkid.desc: Highly social, known to get very uncomfortable outside of its group. They sleep in huge piles to protect eachother and preserve body heat.
cobblemon.species.bonkrete.name: Bonkrete
cobblemon.species.bonkrete.desc: Their heavy bodies are made by Conkid, fusing together at the edges. While it is notoriously difficult to break through, they will separate if things get rough.
cobblemon.species.khancrete.name: Khancrete
cobblemon.species.khancrete.desc: It swings its head, recklessly throwing its wrecking ball about to destroy anything in its wake. They have a rivalry with Conkeldurr.
cobblemon.species.cemu.name: Cemu
cobblemon.species.cemu.desc: Their feathers provide perfect camouflage in the sand. Despite their small stature, they pack a vicious kick.
cobblemon.species.solkiwi.name: Solkiwi
cobblemon.species.osstillery.name: Osstillery
cobblemon.species.figura.name: Figura
cobblemon.species.figura.desc: Believed to be summoned via ancient cave drawings. Figura is two-dimensional; it will always appear flat from any angle to an observer.
cobblemon.species.tofigur.name: Tofigur
cobblemon.species.tofigur.desc: It is curious and seems to study the three dimensional world around it. If one were to look at it from the side, they would find it to be infinitely thin and dangerously sharp.
cobblemon.species.velveil.name: Velveil
cobblemon.species.velveil.desc: Groups of Velveil form in circles under the light of the full moon and stare up at the moon overhead. It is impossible to distract them during their ritual.
cobblemon.species.lunartic.name: Lunartic
cobblemon.species.lunartic.desc: Its appearance underneath its cloak is distressing to the point of causing insanity if viewed for too long. You can tell a Lunartic's age through the velvet on its arm.
cobblemon.species.encyst.name: Encyst
cobblemon.species.encyst.desc: It can't survive long without a host, so seeing one in the wild is rare. Their eggs are laid under the skin of Probee and goomyroast.
cobblemon.species.decapasite.name: Decapasite
cobblemon.species.decapasite.desc: Decapasite's venom is sterile, which prevents the head it lives in from rotting. They lure in prey with odd signals before injecting eggs into them.
cobblemon.species.syreist.name: Syreist
cobblemon.species.syreist.desc: Its eyeball is its main body, and it feeds off of bacteria. It latches onto sick people during the night, sucking their blood to keep itself nourished.
cobblemon.species.injectoplasm.name: Injectoplasm
cobblemon.species.injectoplasm.desc: Its body contains a woopertail of hideous bloodborne illnesses. Entire towns can be shut down because of Injectoplasm sightings.
cobblemon.species.wanupp.name: Wanupp
cobblemon.species.wanupp.desc: Its unassuming appearance masks a very malicious personality. Its cap is covered in spore-filled slime that causes necrosis instantly if touched.
cobblemon.species.sluggummy.name: Sluggummy
cobblemon.species.sluggummy.desc: It leaves a trail of sticky slime behind itself as it moves. The trail is sweet, leading predators to go after the slime instead of itself.
cobblemon.species.gumsopod.name: Gumsopod
cobblemon.species.gumsopod.desc: Its shell is made of 38 different layers of sugar. If swallowed, a Gumsopod can survive in the stomach for up to 7 years.
cobblemon.species.whelasse.name: Whelasse
cobblemon.species.whelasse.desc: Whelasse's hide is so rubbery that it's impossible to take a bite out of. Would-be predators attack it, only to fall into its gaping mouth.
cobblemon.species.derpants.name: Derpants
cobblemon.species.derpants.desc: It lives an amphibious lifestyle, as it is constantly producing a sweat-like poisonous film around itself that repels water.
cobblemon.species.laundronaut.name: Laundronaut
cobblemon.species.laundronaut.desc: If you see a heap of clothes in the wilderness, stay away! It's a sleeping Laundronaut - when grumpy, they spray noxious fumes everywhere.
cobblemon.species.chrone.name: Chrone
cobblemon.species.chrone.desc: A presumably manmade Pokemon that can be seen spying on people. It seems to subsist solely on visual stimulation, as it can only die if its lens is blocked for too long.
cobblemon.species.reconuisance.name: Reconuisance
cobblemon.species.reconuisance.desc: Its lens can zoom in extremely far, allowing it to watch a single person from a mile away. It can relay what it has seen like a projector to its trainer, should it trust them.
cobblemon.species.wotwot.name: Wotwot
cobblemon.species.wotwot.desc: Wotwot will do the bidding of whatever they look up to, no matter how dark or unsafe the job is. For this reason, they're often stereotyped as 'evil' Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.dunnoboss.name: Dunnoboss
cobblemon.species.dunnoboss.desc: Dunnoboss will never abandon whatever duty they are given. Fancy establishments tend to hire them as bouncers.
cobblemon.species.steank.name: Steank
cobblemon.species.steank.desc: (Hemo type.) Although it resembles a slab of meat, this Pokemon tastes incredibly foul. It tends to wander around without aim or purpose, as if entranced by something.
cobblemon.species.infesteak.name: Infesteak
cobblemon.species.infesteak.desc: (Hemo/Poison type.) The worm embedded in its body impairs its vision, but also alerts it to danger. The bone in its gut can be removed and used as a weapon.
cobblemon.species.wormeaty.name: Wormeaty
cobblemon.species.wormeaty.desc: (Hemo/Poison type.)A vast colony of symbiotic worms slithers in and out of its body. The worms govern its every move, although they cannot suppress its hunger.
cobblemon.species.maglut.name: Maglut
cobblemon.species.maglut.desc: They feed on rotting things and other inedible substances, taking in enormous amounts of food at a time. They appear in the hundreds if they find a stable food source.
cobblemon.species.scavengore.name: Scavengore
cobblemon.species.scavengore.desc: Actually a colony of multiple Maglut, with different specialized forms serving different roles for the colony. They'll disperse if threatened, but will come back together when the coast is clear.
cobblemon.species.wrigormort.name: Wrigormort
cobblemon.species.wrigormort.desc: Notorious for defiling graves to search for food, able to strip meat from an entire carcass in minutes. When in danger, it regurgitates rotting meat.
cobblemon.species.lymfite.name: Lymfite
cobblemon.species.lymfite.desc: It marks its territory with hyper-sterile blue goo it produces from its fingertips. If it sees a poison-type, it goes on a rampage.
cobblemon.species.leukofite.name: Leukofite
cobblemon.species.leukofite.desc: It can see bacteria and viruses on any surface, sending it into an outrage. Anything it deems unclean is drowned in its slime.
cobblemon.species.ceresplit.name: Ceresplit
cobblemon.species.ceresplit.desc: An elusive lava-bodied Pokemon that only grows a protective shell on one half of its body. If, by accident, it were to grow one on the other half, it would break it off. Nobody really knows why it does this.
cobblemon.species.probee.name: Probee
cobblemon.species.probee.desc: Each individual Probee is nearly identical. They have weak telepathic abilities, mostly used to communicate with eachother.
cobblemon.species.dysolony.name: Dysolony
cobblemon.species.dysolony.desc: Its abdomen is made out of a substance it produces which is lighter than foam but harder than titanium. Thousands of 'drones' live in its abdomen, repairing breaks in the hull and fending off attackers.
cobblemon.species.tictoc.name: Tictoc
cobblemon.species.tictoc.desc: An ancient Pokemon with impeccable foresight. It is impossible to get the upper hand on it, as it can read the future almost perfectly.
cobblemon.species.outatime.name: Outatime
cobblemon.species.outatime.desc: Its body is made of thousands of moving parts, which seem to affect the time-space continuum around it. It can travel into the past and future at will, making it extremely hard to capture.
cobblemon.species.wahundo.name: Wahundo
cobblemon.species.wahundo.desc: Its diet consists mostly of cotton and paper. It lays flat on its face to imitate a regular dollar so unaware explorers will hopefully take it.
cobblemon.species.swallet.name: Swallet
cobblemon.species.swallet.desc: Their mouth generally remains closed at all times, to keep the hoard of money inside. It only opens it when absolutely necessary to pelt an attacker with an onslaught of coins.
cobblemon.species.pleech.name: Pleech
cobblemon.species.pleech.desc: Their sucker-shaped heads are flexible. Once it latches onto an artery or vein, it thrusts in and out, forcing blood to the surface like a plunger.
cobblemon.species.denartery.name: Denartery
cobblemon.species.denartery.desc: It has grown to take on a more predatory lifestyle. Old habits die hard, though, as it is commonly seen trying to latch onto a larger Pokemon and getting dragged around uncomfortably.
cobblemon.species.psyrus.name: Psyrus
cobblemon.species.psyrus.desc: They tend to pop up in heavily diseased areas. It can cut through flesh with its legs, but it won't cause any pain at all.
cobblemon.species.adnaviria.name: Adnaviria
cobblemon.species.adnaviria.desc: Its strange, warped anatomy is the result of mutations in its genetic makeup. Its legs are surgically sharp and leave wounds completely sterile, making it a lifesaver in the operating room.
cobblemon.species.caecarette.name: Caecarette
cobblemon.species.caecarette.desc: While they normally live buried in the ash of volcanoes, global warming has led to their spread to urban environments. When threatened, they belch out clouds of smoke.
cobblemon.species.tobamander.name: Tobamander
cobblemon.species.tobamander.desc: Feeding off of rare herbs, each Tobamander's smoke has a distinct smell. When they shed, the old skin is burnt off, leaving trails of ash.
cobblemon.species.planeedle.name: Planeedle
cobblemon.species.planeedle.desc: It fishes for prey with its pointed tail, which is also used in battles for territory. The loser must leave the swamp forever.
cobblemon.species.dualance.name: Dualance
cobblemon.species.dualance.desc: This Pokemon's bladed tails are used to spar with rivals. Great care is taken to avoid dealing serious injury, however.
cobblemon.species.ballooky.name: Ballooky
cobblemon.species.ballooky.desc: Believed to come from the same ancestor as Jigglypuff. It's thin skin is weak, so it uses its flashing eyes to ward off any would-be predators.
cobblemon.species.unseelium.name: Unseelium
cobblemon.species.unseelium.desc: Their head is filled with enough helium to lift their tiny bodies off the ground. If its head bursts, it simply grows a new one. Their gaze instills visceral fear in anyone it locks eyes with.
cobblemon.species.ouronouro.name: Ouronouro
cobblemon.species.ouronouro.desc: Its existence is hard to prove, as anyone seeing it is lulled into a mysterious, dreamlike trance. It can summon hallucinations in its foes when endangered.
cobblemon.species.uranug.name: Uranug
cobblemon.species.uranug.desc: The material Uranug is made of has a very short half-life. Prolonged contact with its skin can cause severe radiation burns.
cobblemon.species.oreium.name: Oreium
cobblemon.species.oreium.desc: While its skin is dangerous on its own, the most radioactive part of its body is its heart. When excited enough, it is known to explode quite violently, easily surpassing Electrode's percussive strength.
cobblemon.species.nukemu.name: Nukemu
cobblemon.species.nukemu.desc: Its mere presence flushes the caves it lives in with lethal amounts of radiation. It can split atoms with little effort, so extreme measures are taken to make sure none remain in the wild.
cobblemon.species.nomster.name: Nomster
cobblemon.species.nomster.desc: Gnawver are voracious, indiscriminately chewing on anything in sight. They are popular ‘starter’ Pokemon for inexperienced trainers, as they’ll eat just about anything.
cobblemon.species.beavomnom.name: Beavomnom
cobblemon.species.beavomnom.desc: Their bite can prove to be lethal due to the bacteria swarming in their mouth. They build dams out of fallen branches, gluing them together with their viscous saliva.
cobblemon.species.fatfish.name: Fatfish
cobblemon.species.fatfish.desc: Its appearance is disturbing and its smell is off-putting, but this Pokemon has the strange ability to charm almost any opponent.
cobblemon.species.blobhorent.name: Blobhorent
cobblemon.species.blobhorent.desc: Many sailors have found themselves irresistibly drawn to Blobhorent, obsessing over it for weeks afterwards. It has earned the nickname the Sea Hag.
cobblemon.species.floundirt.name: Floundirt
cobblemon.species.floundirt.desc: Their natural coloration and flat shape allows them to blend in with the muddy seabed perfectly. They taste terrible, so fishermen often avoid them.
cobblemon.species.gildefish.name: Gildefish
cobblemon.species.gildefish.desc: They swallow pebbles and shiny objects to build dens under the seafloor. If you drop any jewelry in the water, it will likely be eaten by a Gildefish.
cobblemon.species.haunk.name: Haunk
cobblemon.species.haunk.desc: Haunk live off of emotions, positive or negative. Some prefer to entertain, while others thrive off of scaring people.
cobblemon.species.apocalypso.name: Apocalypso
cobblemon.species.apocalypso.desc: Its top jaw spins slowly while its bottom jaw stays put, only moving when on the prowl. Prey can be seen digesting inside its mouth through its thin teeth.
cobblemon.species.erfwerm.name: Erfwerm
cobblemon.species.erfwerm.desc: They start small, but grow as they eat sand. Many tunnels in the Enrikan desert are the result of hungry Erfwerm colonies.
cobblemon.species.dunewyrm.name: Dunewyrm
cobblemon.species.arcnid.name: Arcnid
cobblemon.species.arcnid.desc: Arcnid stalk the dunes at night, preying on Pokemon like Camelt. Their three stingers paralyze their prey, allowing Arcnid to store prey for weeks at a time before feeding.
cobblemon.species.urinee.name: Urinee
cobblemon.species.urinee.desc: As a bottomfeeder, it gets its nutrients from whatever filth it can find. Its unusual appearance, which resembles a urinal, helps it blend into its environment.
cobblemon.species.turmoilet.name: Turmoilet
cobblemon.species.turmoilet.desc: As a coprophage, it lives in sewers where its food source is most plentiful. Rumors of a 'butt-eating monster' tend to follow Turmoilet sightings in cities.
cobblemon.species.loameo.name: Loameo
cobblemon.species.loameo.desc: On average, they live only weeks. Because of this, it's a race against time for Loameo to mate every summer.
cobblemon.species.cupidtera.name: Cupidtera
cobblemon.species.cupidtera.desc: The pair are inseparable, fused at the abdomen. They fire 'love darts' to protect other Loameo; finding an abandoned love dart is a sign that you'll soon meet your special someone.
cobblemon.species.celibug.name: Celibug
cobblemon.species.celibug.desc: Too full of rage to die, Celibug are spiteful at their inability to find a mate. As such, they dedicate their lives to keep other Loameo from mating.
cobblemon.species.pumacle.name: Pumacle
cobblemon.species.pumacle.desc: They form their shells from cooling magma, migrating downwards to live in the ocean. Their shells are brittle and flaky, but buoyant.
cobblemon.species.tunicrust.name: Tunicrust
cobblemon.species.tunicrust.desc: Normally, they lie dormant in their shells, filter feeding. Their grip is impossible to break, making them a nuisance to sailors worldwide.
cobblemon.species.metrognome.name: Metrognome
cobblemon.species.metrognome.desc: Born from the insecurities and grudges of artists, Metrognome makes a clicking sound every second until it dies. Listening to it for long periods of time is maddening.
cobblemon.species.phonemon.name: Phonemon
cobblemon.species.phonemon.desc: Locking an inmate in the same room as a loudmouthed Phonemon used to be a widespread method of interrogation. Its bite is just as strong as its bark.
cobblemon.species.zuupie.name: Zuupie
cobblemon.species.zuupie.desc: They live in the sea, catching food with the hairs on their arms. Each one is born with an embryo developing inside it.
cobblemon.species.cocarid.name: Cocarid
cobblemon.species.cocarid.desc: Inside its body, another Zuupie grows. Its internal organs are replaced by its 'offspring', slowly turning it into a living cocoon. Its method of reproduction is unseen in any other Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.skelacian.name: Skelacian
cobblemon.species.skelacian.desc: Clinging to what little life force it had, the discarded cocoon turns into a spirit Pokemon, relentlessly defending the Zuupie that it previously harbored.
cobblemon.species.tapunt.name: Tapunt
cobblemon.species.tapunt.desc: Its fur is laced with chemicals that can induce drowsiness. This paired with its impressive punch lets it knock its predators unconscious.
cobblemon.species.somniarch.name: Somniarch
cobblemon.species.somniarch.desc: A single uppercut from a Somniarch can knock out a pro wrestler. If this doesn't work, it will disappear in a cloud of sleeping dust.
cobblemon.species.khatut.name: Khatut
cobblemon.species.khatut.desc: The metal prod on its head reverberates its brainwaves, giving it the ability to read minds. It uses this ability to discern prey from predators in the dark.
cobblemon.species.cleocatra.name: Cleocatra
cobblemon.species.cleocatra.desc: The metal prod on its head reverberates its brainwaves, giving it the ability to read minds. It uses this ability to discern prey from predators in the dark.
cobblemon.species.cavitrio.name: Cavitrio
cobblemon.species.cavitrio.desc: Parents commonly tell children that their teeth will turn into Cavitrio if they don't brush. They feed off of scraps, absorbing it through their chalky skin.
cobblemon.species.cavitroupe.name: Cavitroupe
cobblemon.species.cavitroupe.desc: Its actual body is the visible miasma it produces. When in danger, it retreats into the shells of its many teeth.
cobblemon.species.macatherm.name: Macatherm
cobblemon.species.macatherm.desc: The buoyant organ around its waist inflates during the winter, letting it float on the surface of the hot springs it frequents. They are often seen seasoning their food in the spring water before eating it, suggesting humanlike intelligence.
cobblemon.species.geyserilla.name: Geyserilla
cobblemon.species.hooptie.name: Hooptie
cobblemon.species.hooptie.desc: Legends say that Hooptie are born from car crash wreckage, but in reality they just congregate in junkyards. They love to drink oil.
cobblemon.species.wreckyard.name: Wreckyard
cobblemon.species.wreckyard.desc: Wreckyard are adept at grabbing things with their huge iron claws. They scoop up everything they can into their carriage, which is crushed into tiny cubes.
cobblemon.species.phantape.name: Phantape
cobblemon.species.phantape.desc: It was first sighted in an abandoned warehouse. Whatever you do, do not put one in a VHS player.
cobblemon.species.monitasm.name: Monitasm
cobblemon.species.monitasm.desc: Whatever is displayed on its screen is unique for each viewer. They are all similarly horrific, however.
cobblemon.species.nafugu.name: Nafugu
cobblemon.species.nafugu.desc: Nafugu live floating in the open sea, usually in inconvenient locations. When touched, they spontaneously combust, flinging spikes all over.
cobblemon.species.exploseave.name: Exploseave
cobblemon.species.exploseave.desc: Exploseave's internal anatomy is designed to trigger a massive explosion when injured. As long as its tail remains, it will regrow its entire body after detonating.
cobblemon.species.weathermach.name: Weathermach
cobblemon.species.weathermach.desc: Weathermach live in the upper atmosphere, dropping to lower altitudes to feed. They can release pulses of energy that govern the local weather.
cobblemon.species.conductile.name: Conductile
cobblemon.species.conductile.desc: By arcing ambient electricity through its pronged horns, it can surge electricity through its teeth, making its bite seriously dangerous.
cobblemon.species.batterex.name: Batterex
cobblemon.species.batterex.desc: Its entire skeleton is lined with copper alloy, forming an open circuit that closes when it shuts its jaws. Its blunt teeth serve as capacitors to fill its target with lethal amounts of electricity.
cobblemon.species.poyai.name: Poyai
cobblemon.species.poyai.desc: Poyai are born near sites of significant geothermal activity. To conserve body heat, they tend to stack on top of each other, forming large towers.
cobblemon.species.beaki.name: Beaki
cobblemon.species.beaki.desc: They are unable to fly despite their broad pair of wings. Their loud cries carry over the rocky beaches and mountains they live in for miles.
cobblemon.species.cockroast.name: Cockroast
cobblemon.species.cockroast.desc: cockroast live in packs, sharing their body heat to keep their nests warm. They are widely regarded as pests due to how well they can adapt to urban environments.
cobblemon.species.roaspector.name: Roaspector
cobblemon.species.roaspector.desc: To carve tunnels for cockroast colonies, it produces pressurized egg-sacs and lights them aflame. The resulting explosion has been known to level buildings.
cobblemon.species.copperado.name: Copperado
cobblemon.species.copperado.desc: Built long ago by an ancient civilization, Copperado continue to defend the ruins they live to this day. Their accuracy is unmatched.
cobblemon.species.relode.name: Relode
cobblemon.species.relode.desc: Despite their age, some continue to use Relode as personal bodyguards due to their reliability. At point blank, their blast can bust a hole through a tank's hull.
cobblemon.species.snomagnon.name: Snomagnon
cobblemon.species.snomagnon.desc: Snomagnon are living fossils, as they managed to survive several extinction events by freezing themselves. Sometimes they are accidentally released from glaciers.
cobblemon.species.cromountain.name: Cromountain
cobblemon.species.cromountain.desc: Cromountain's DNA is frighteningly similar to human DNA. They are gentle giants, preferring to play with tools as opposed to fighting.
cobblemon.species.eyesoar.name: Eyesoar
cobblemon.species.eyesoar.desc: Their single eye grants them impressive night vision, but they lack depth perception. They gorge themselves on blood at night.
cobblemon.species.pteroculus.name: Pteroculus
cobblemon.species.pteroculus.desc: Pteroculus live on mountainsides, not preferring the cramped confines of caves. An energy blast from its eye is enough to reduce rocks to powder.
cobblemon.species.strelair.name: Strelair
cobblemon.species.strelair.desc: Strelair's leaves generate enough lift to uproot itself and soar through the air. When it lands, it simply roots back into the ground.
cobblemon.species.reginaegle.name: Reginaegle
cobblemon.species.reginaegle.desc: The fact that it has multiple heads would seem like a major downside, but amazingly, Reginaegle has no problem flying or even sharing its food despite its polycephaly.
cobblemon.species.wyfern.name: Wyfern
cobblemon.species.wyfern.desc: Its massive wooden body manages to be extremely rigid, yet flexible at the same time, allowing it to fly and weave through the forests it guards with ease.
cobblemon.species.grippit.name: Grippit
cobblemon.species.grippit.desc: Lacking chlorophyll, these parasites leech nutrients off of other plants. Their favorite hosts are the fungi that grow around dead bodies.
cobblemon.species.palmpale.name: Palmpale
cobblemon.species.palmpale.desc: It occasionally parasitizes animals, leaving its hosts with horrible visions afterwards. If you ever feel a cold touch on your shoulder, it may be a hungry Palmpale.
cobblemon.species.jellysquish.name: Jellysquish
cobblemon.species.jellysquish.desc: The bell and its tentacles are two separate organisms. Its bell keeps it floating on the surface of the water as the tentacles consume food particles below.
cobblemon.species.phonowar.name: Phonowar
cobblemon.species.phonowar.desc: At night, their bulbs flash colors to attract mates. These underwater lightshows are known to bring Magellorb to the surface.
cobblemon.species.grubzero.name: Grubzero
cobblemon.species.grubzero.desc: Grubzero are herbivores that eat only the fallen winter leaves. Their superficial resemblance to Slunny is a defense mechanism, as predators avoid them instinctively.
cobblemon.species.crystalis.name: Crystalis
cobblemon.species.crystalis.desc: When it evolves, Grubzero encases itself in its own ice and waits. It need not worry about predators, as no sane Pokemon would break open an ice block just to get such a small morsel.
cobblemon.species.bugsled.name: Bugsled
cobblemon.species.bugsled.desc: It is trapped in a cocoon from which it will never hatch. By gaining momentum, it can accelerate to almost 180 miles per hour in search of a mate.
cobblemon.species.himilago.name: Himilago
cobblemon.species.himilago.desc: After emerging from its frozen cocoon, Himilago rides clouds of icy mist and fog, living a carefree and jovial life. Its wings scatter snowflakes wherever it flies.
cobblemon.species.volnellid.name: Volnellid
cobblemon.species.volnellid.desc: Volnellid need extreme heat to survive. Normally they live around hydrothermal vents, but undersea lava tubes sometimes bring them to the surface.
cobblemon.species.chenchor.name: Chenchor
cobblemon.species.chenchor.desc: Its long antlers are used to collect chemicals from the air, which it synthesizes into food. While it looks like a worm, it is more closely related to Crabyss.
cobblemon.species.foramini.name: Foramini
cobblemon.species.foramini.desc: It draws in slush and sediment from the frigid seafloor to build its icy carapace. When it dies, this shell returns to the seafloor, and the cycle continues.
cobblemon.species.structica.name: Structica
cobblemon.species.structica.desc: It catches its prey in its sticky pseudopodia and digests them externally. Fossilized remains of Structica can be found in ancient limestones.
cobblemon.species.iceidic.name: Iceidic
cobblemon.species.iceidic.desc: Its body produces a strong, yellow acid that it uses to mark its territory in the snow. Ancient Enrikans used its acid to flavor their drinks.
cobblemon.species.galvanade.name: Galvanade
cobblemon.species.galvanade.desc: The face of every ice cream parlor in Enriko. Its two heads contain different blends of ultra-sour slush; when mixed, it's potent enough to melt through solid stone.
cobblemon.species.pinecoal.name: Pinecoal
cobblemon.species.pinecoal.desc: It falls from trees in the cold parts of Enriko. To reproduce, it requires to be bathed in the heat of a forest fire to spread it's seeds.
cobblemon.species.confurnace.name: Confurnace
cobblemon.species.confurnace.desc: While it is constantly burning, it will never completely burn up until it dies. Instead of smoke, it exhumes a pleasant, inviting smell.
cobblemon.species.slunny.name: Slunny
cobblemon.species.slunny.desc: They sleep for 18 hours a day, buried in snow. If you wake one up during its slumber, it will go into a violent frenzy.
cobblemon.species.lagawake.name: Lagawake
cobblemon.species.lagawake.desc: They dig tunnels underground to create safe dens, where they hibernate for most of the winter. They can attack even in the midst of REM sleep.
cobblemon.species.hibernabbit.name: Hibernabbit
cobblemon.species.hibernabbit.desc: It sleeps throughout almost the entire year, only waking up on certain nights. Nobody has woken one up and survived.
cobblemon.species.chichera.name: Chichera
cobblemon.species.chichera.desc: Chichera eggs are laid only in the most remote locations, like mountaintops or caves. From birth they are adept predators, although they cannot fly.
cobblemon.species.ophifowl.name: Ophifowl
cobblemon.species.ophifowl.desc: As they lack legs, they move around by flailing their wings, using their tail to steer. Since they are clumsy, they petrify their prey with their glare before striking.
cobblemon.species.gizzardon.name: Gizzardon
cobblemon.species.gizzardon.desc: Dangerous and cunning, although they avoid human contact at all costs. Centuries ago, they were hunted to near extinction to train nobles and knights.
cobblemon.species.porytleg.name: Porytleg
cobblemon.species.porytleg.desc: (breed porygon in enriko to hatch porytleg.) The result of an indecent attempt to replicate Porygon's code. They're inferior to Porygon and are infamously vulnerable to diseases and parasites.
cobblemon.species.porytlegz.name: Porytleg-Z
cobblemon.species.porytlegz.desc: The Dubious Disk causes Porytleg's bugs to go haywire, taking full control. It loves to plug into PCs, corrupting them and consuming the Pokemon held within.
cobblemon.species.golantern.name: Golantern
cobblemon.species.golantern.desc: It is formed from the souls of people who died lost in forests or deserts. The lantern they carry at all times tends to create eerie lights known as will o' wisps.
cobblemon.species.spotnight.name: Spotnight
cobblemon.species.spotnight.desc: They prowl cities, staking out those who commit horrible crimes. Should its lantern's eye cross with yours, your soul will be taken.
cobblemon.species.urnymph.name: Urnymph
cobblemon.species.urnymph.desc: They eat rotting flesh from catacombs and burial grounds. Their favorite food is cremated ash - they'll raid an urn and then wear it to protect its squishy body.
cobblemon.species.monymph.name: Monymph
cobblemon.species.monymph.desc: It exhumes graves for food, carrying the headstone on its back for shelter. During the day, they hide underground, so grave keepers will find their yard mysteriously rearranged overnight.
cobblemon.species.nuishot.name: Nuishot
cobblemon.species.nuishot.desc: It keeps clay pellets inside it's beak and gizzard. To hunt, it aims at it's target and fires a pellet at over 200 miles per hour.
cobblemon.species.watchtowl.name: Watchtowl
cobblemon.species.watchtowl.desc: One of the landmarks of northern Enriko is the highest point in Plumvale, where you can see the heads of hunting Watchtowl over the forest canopy.
cobblemon.species.femimic.name: Femimic
cobblemon.species.femimic.desc: Pretending to be a damsel in distress, this sneaky sprite waits for people to come and 'save' it, lowering their guard for an easy strike.
cobblemon.species.tuncanny.name: Tuncanny
cobblemon.species.tuncanny.desc: During the day, they bury themselves in sand so their amorphous bodies don't dry up. If its steel shell breaks, it'll replace it with any junk it can find.
cobblemon.species.udderling.name: Udderling
cobblemon.species.udderling.desc: From birth, they are infected with a disease that exclusively infects it. Its disease makes you violently ill, so predators quickly learn to avoid it.
cobblemon.species.milkdud.name: Milkdud
cobblemon.species.milkdud.desc: Its udder contains a festering cocktail of abscesses and pus, which it uses to keep its offspring infected. If threatened, it can collapse into a puddle of grime to slip away.
cobblemon.species.piessano.name: Piessano
cobblemon.species.piessano.desc: While it eats whatever its slimy skin can absorb, it has a notoriously picky palette. Feed it something it doesn't like, and watch it make a mess in seconds.
cobblemon.species.fatom.name: Fatom
cobblemon.species.fatom.desc: Fatom congregate in areas of high electromagnetic activity. They absorb as much energy as they can hold and release it all in an EMP burst.
cobblemon.species.encelope.name: Encelope
cobblemon.species.encelope.desc: They are said to have come from a meteor strike. Encelope attempt to cover the heads of unsuspecting prey to feed off of their thoughts.
cobblemon.species.controlyu.name: Controlyu
cobblemon.species.controlyu.desc: It devours the memories of its prey, leaving them a mindless husk afterwards. The larger its brain, the stronger it is.
cobblemon.species.magelorb.name: Magelorb
cobblemon.species.magelorb.desc: Magelorb float in the sky, casting lights down below. They can be attracted to the ground by bright, flashing lights.
cobblemon.species.discobrawl.name: Discobrawl
cobblemon.species.discobrawl.desc: It communicates through complicated arm and leg movements. Its unique way of communicating has inspired many dance moves over the years.
cobblemon.species.christrap.name: Christrap
cobblemon.species.christrap.desc: It gets buried in snow when winter comes along, its tree-shaped lure poking out. If something lands on the loose snow filling its cavernous mouth, they fall in and get digested almost instantly.
cobblemon.species.natomy.name: Natomy
cobblemon.species.natomy.desc: When a Natomy locks eyes with someone, they become linked. Any damage done to the Natomy is delivered tenfold to any unfortunate souls linked to it.
cobblemon.species.pigid.name: Pigid
cobblemon.species.pigid.desc: They swell their bodies up with freezing cold brine to maintain their shape. Sometimes they're brought up from the bottom of the ocean in trawling nets.
cobblemon.species.bysoderm.name: Bysoderm
cobblemon.species.bysoderm.desc: They voraciously consume whatever they can get their tentacles on before migrating. Bones can be seen digesting through its transparent skin.
cobblemon.species.rubbison.name: Rubbison
cobblemon.species.rubbison.desc: It's rubbery hide is impenetrable; bullets fired at it will bounce right off. If set on fire, however, it will be reduced to ash in seconds.
cobblemon.species.microcosmic.name: Microcosmic
cobblemon.species.microcosmic.desc: Microcosmic obsessively care for the algae that live inside its body, providing it with heat. It is thought that the algae came from another planet, and is dependent on this Pokemon to survive its new environment.
cobblemon.species.artickey.name: Artickey
cobblemon.species.artickey.desc: Its angular body resembles a key, to which the lock has yet to be found. When sleeping, they hide inside of tiny holes in the caves they live in.
cobblemon.species.mettlemaw.name: Mettlemaw
cobblemon.species.mettlemaw.desc: It chews on metal wire, leading to a mass of wires to get caught in between its teeth. They do this to reinforce their teeth, allowing them to hunt their favorite prey - Cavitrio.
cobblemon.species.scourgeon.name: Scourgeon
cobblemon.species.scourgeon.desc: It uses its steel appendages to gouge Cavitrio from the walls of caves, doing so even when not hungry. They sleep in the rain to allow their metal to oxidize overnight.
cobblemon.species.tenanchre.name: Tenanchre
cobblemon.species.tenanchre.desc: Significant paranormal activity inside a house has turned the house itself into a ghostly Pokemon. Furniture and pipes inside the house form its inner workings.
cobblemon.species.draginas.name: Draginas
cobblemon.species.draginas.desc: Each Draginas has a giant symbiotic worm living in its digestive tract. When it lays eggs, so does the worm, so the cycle continues.
cobblemon.species.biffka.name: Biffka
cobblemon.species.biffka.desc: It is born from a neglected pot pie, left for the buzzards outside. It can often be seen sitting in the middle of major roadways, stubbornly blocking traffic.
cobblemon.species.nutzen.name: Nutzen
cobblemon.species.nutzen.desc: They were built as toys for children, but the factory mysteriously shut down. They love to eat metal scrap.
cobblemon.species.shyleon.name: Shyleon
cobblemon.species.shyleon.desc: An exceptionally timid Pokemon always wearing a mask that covers it face. The mask itself seems to be its power source.
cobblemon.species.shyleonterrestrial.des: The Red Energy enhanced its ability to camouflage. It is almost impossible to detect Shyleon in its habitat.
cobblemon.species.shyleonxenoversal.name: Shyleon
cobblemon.species.shyleonxenoversal.desc: It Aquired magic powers after absorbing the Blue Energy. It was revered as a deity by an ancient civilization.
cobblemon.species.shyleonastral.name: Shyleon
cobblemon.species.shyleonastral.desc: Shyleon's real form. In ancient times, it fought with its brothers alongside Luxflon to defeat the Chaos throughout the universe.
cobblemon.species.shyleonx.name: Shyleon
cobblemon.species.shyleonx.desc: Made of pure X Energy, this serpentine Pokemon wraps around enemies until it chokes them.
cobblemon.species.trishout.name: Trishout
cobblemon.species.trishout.desc: Despite its size, it can already shout very loudly. If it cries too much, it becomes voiceless and coughs smoke.
cobblemon.species.trishoutterrestrial.de: It has become more competitive thanks to the Red Energy. It goes wild during battle, releasing scorching flames from its horn.
cobblemon.species.trishoutxenoversal.des: The Blue Energy has given it an overwhelming explosive power. It ejects air from the ports on its body to boost its fiery roars.
cobblemon.species.trishoutastral.name: Trishout
cobblemon.species.trishoutastral.desc: Trishout's real form. In ancient times, it fought with its brothers alongside Luxflon to defeat the Chaos throughout the universe.
cobblemon.species.trishoutx.name: Trishout
cobblemon.species.trishoutx.desc: Made of pure X Energy, this Pokemon attacks its enemies ruthlessly until you knock them out.
cobblemon.species.shulong.name: Shulong
cobblemon.species.shulong.desc: Its blue covering skin is very elastic and can rebound attacks. However, it is extremely sensitive to cold.
cobblemon.species.shulongterrestrial.des: The energy of Planet Earth has turned its skin into a coriaceous armor. After every wound, it comes back harder.
cobblemon.species.shulongxenoversal.name: Shulong
cobblemon.species.shulongxenoversal.desc: Blue Energy has made it vicious and territorial. No one is able to take on it underwater.
cobblemon.species.shulongastral.name: Shulong
cobblemon.species.shulongastral.desc: Shulong's real form. In ancient times, it fought with its brothers alongside Luxflon to defeat the Chaos throughout the universe.
cobblemon.species.shulongx.name: Shulong
cobblemon.species.shulongx.desc: Made of pure X Energy, this Pokemon stuns its enemies from behind, then takes advantage of them and hits them relentlessly.
cobblemon.species.sparkowl.name: Sparkowl
cobblemon.species.sparkowl.desc: It has a peaceful nature and attacks only when threatened. First it paralyzes the enemy with a weak electric shock, then runs away.
cobblemon.species.shawkbird.name: Shawkbird
cobblemon.species.shawkbird.desc: You can see flocks of Shawkbird during storms. If you touch one of them while it's flying, you will get zapped.
cobblemon.species.harrowk.name: Harrowk
cobblemon.species.harrowk.desc: It lives on mountaintops that are likely to be stricken by lightning bolts. It stores electricity in its cloud, then plummets down to strike its prey.
cobblemon.species.yemin.name: Yemin
cobblemon.species.yemin.desc: It constantly undertakes an intense meditation training. As a result of this, it is always super focused in battles.
cobblemon.species.kungfur.name: Kungfur
cobblemon.species.kungfur.desc: Thanks to the strong experience it has acquired in countless battles, it teaches weak Pokemon to fight. It is very strict as an instructor.
cobblemon.species.masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.masgot.desc: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokemon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.fire_masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.fire_masgot.desc1: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokemon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.ghost_masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.ghost_masgot.desc1: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokemon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.ice_masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.ice_masgot.desc1: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokemon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.dark_masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.dark_masgot.desc1: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokemon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.electric_masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.electric_masgot.desc1: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokemon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.fighting_masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.fighting_masgot.desc1: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokemon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.flying_masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.flying_masgot.desc1: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokemon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.grass_masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.grass_masgot.desc1: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokemon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.rock_masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.rock_masgot.desc1: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokemon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.poison_masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.poison_masgot.desc1: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokemon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.ground_masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.ground_masgot.desc1: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokemon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.steel_masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.steel_masgot.desc1: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokemon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.water_masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.water_masgot.desc1: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokemon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.sound_masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.sound_masgot.desc1: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokemon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.psychic_masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.psychic_masgot.desc1: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokemon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.dragon_masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.dragon_masgot.desc1: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokemon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.fairy_masgot.name: Masgot
cobblemon.species.fairy_masgot.desc1: It defends from predators assuming the form of bigger Pokemon. It is very popular among Bug Maniacs.
cobblemon.species.bremand.name: Bremand
cobblemon.species.bremand.desc: It is said this Pokemon represents the soul of music. It has full control over its voice so that it can adapt to any kind of song.
cobblemon.species.guitarist_bremand.name: Bremand
cobblemon.species.guitarist_bremand.desc: It is said this Pokemon represents the soul of music. The electrifying solos it plays with its big whiskers will make your hair stand on end.
cobblemon.species.drummer_bremand.name: Bremand
cobblemon.species.drummer_bremand.desc1: It is said this Pokemon represents the soul of music. Thumping its chest with two drumsticks, it boost the morale to anyone who's listening.
cobblemon.species.bassist_bremand.name: Bremand
cobblemon.species.bassist_bremand.desc1: It is said this Pokemon represents the soul of music. It quietly strims its tail, but occasionally it can play unexpectedly energetic grooves.
cobblemon.species.puppillon.name: Puppillon
cobblemon.species.puppillon.desc: It takes control of other Pokemon to do whatever it wants. However, it does this not with malevolence, but just because it is bashful.
cobblemon.species.hangead.name: Hangead
cobblemon.species.hangead.desc: It controls Pokemon and human beings as puppets using its strings. Feeding on their life energy, it turns their bodies in soul-less empty shells.
cobblemon.species.nunvil.name: Nunvil
cobblemon.species.nunvil.desc: Behind its lovely graceful appearance lies a spiteful side. It will terrify its enemies just for fun.
cobblemon.species.whisteract.name: Whisteract
cobblemon.species.whisteract.desc: Whisteract haunts abandoned mansions, jealously guarding everything inside. It's said to be very vengeful towards raiders.
cobblemon.species.blingrimm.name: Blingrimm
cobblemon.species.blingrimm.desc: It is a real miners' nightmare. A single touch of its metal claws and you will be badly intoxicated.
cobblemon.species.blingrudge.name: Blingrudge
cobblemon.species.blingrudge.desc: Compressing and releasing its spiked tail, it will pierce even the thickest walls. It builds complicated tunnels in mazes to exhaust its preys.
cobblemon.species.hikiloo.name: Hikiloo
cobblemon.species.hikiloo.desc: Hikiloo is a perfect partner for beginners. It will always follow orders by its Trainer it sees as a leader.
cobblemon.species.mylomute.name: Mylomute
cobblemon.species.mylomute.desc: Extremely loyal and intelligent Pokemon. It is widely used for pulling sleds since it can scent the safe route even in a blizzard.
cobblemon.species.kidoon.name: Kidoon
cobblemon.species.kidoon.desc: It's incredible fertile in ponds and swamps. It feeds on microorganisms it filters with its large mouth.
cobblemon.species.honchen.name: Honchen
cobblemon.species.honchen.desc: Revered as a deity in the past. Somewhere in the world, there's still the tradition to welcome the new year dedicating it a dance.
cobblemon.species.persage.name: Persage
cobblemon.species.persage.desc: It can see the future through its crystal ball. Those who ask it for prediction more than three times will be cursed for life.
cobblemon.species.koinkoin.name: Koinkoin
cobblemon.species.koinkoin.desc: The more it moves, the more is the gold it drops from its navel. After an intense struggle, its Trainer will make plenty of Nuggets.
cobblemon.species.beefle.name: Beefle
cobblemon.species.beefle.desc: It runs around full of vitality and charges into bigger and stronger Pokemon. Its external shell hardens over time.
cobblemon.species.punchbug.name: Punchbug
cobblemon.species.punchbug.desc: They hang on tree branches, letting Beefle punching them to store the energy required to evolve.
cobblemon.species.hercurcules.name: Hercurcules
cobblemon.species.hercurcules.desc: It overcomes opponents with its huge body. It categorically refuses to battle against a Pokemon it doesn't deem worthy.
cobblemon.species.chigami.name: Chigami
cobblemon.species.chigami.desc: Its skin has the same properties as the paper. Apparently origamis were invented looking at this exact Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.grudako.name: Grudako
cobblemon.species.grudako.desc: According to the legend, this origami crane came to life thanks to a mystical melody after the death of its child creator.
cobblemon.species.sabolt.name: Sabolt
cobblemon.species.sabolt.desc: Information about this Pokemon is shrouded in mystery. It is said to have appeared after a power outage.
cobblemon.species.saboltterrestrial.name: Sabolt
cobblemon.species.saboltterrestrial.desc: It looks like the Red Energy had somehow affected this Pokemon. Wrapped in the darkness of its cloak, it shoots thunderbolts all of sudden.
cobblemon.species.saboltxenoversal.name: Sabolt
cobblemon.species.saboltxenoversal.desc: It appears to be affected by the Blue Energy too, becoming fierce and savage. It fires immense dark lightning bolts from its mane charged with electricity.
cobblemon.species.gachigachoo.name: Gachigachoo
cobblemon.species.gachigachoo.desc: It withstands low temperatures thanks to its thick fur coat. If you rub that, it will charge with static electricity and electrocute.
cobblemon.species.hystearic.name: Hystearic
cobblemon.species.hystearic.desc: If someone tries to yank them out of the ground while they're sleeping, these Pokemon will shriek out loud making even large size Pokemon dizzy.
cobblemon.species.wystearia.name: Wystearia
cobblemon.species.wystearia.desc: It chatters non-stop in the shade of its foliage. Whoever accidentally catches the sound waves from its floreal antennas will have to swallow it endless babble.
cobblemon.species.pepequeno.name: Pepequeno
cobblemon.species.pepequeno.desc: It is coated with an oily, spicy substance. Pretending to be a Berry, it waits for someone to bite it. Then it laughs out loud on its own joke.
cobblemon.species.scovile.name: Scovile
cobblemon.species.scovile.desc: The color of its tail is indicative of its body temperature and its actual mood. If it rampages, it will burn everything down.
cobblemon.species.scovilex.name: ScovileX
cobblemon.species.scovilex.desc: The Scovile owned by Dimension Colonel Dahlia. When ingested, its seeds will electrocute the body from the inside.
cobblemon.species.excalibould.name: Excalibould
cobblemon.species.excalibould.desc: This rock pile came to life thanks to the combative spirit of past paladins that inhabited the sword wedged in it.
cobblemon.species.madieval.name: Madieval
cobblemon.species.madieval.desc: It is said that the mystical energy which fills this Pokemon and makes its stones float around is somehow related to the Moon's influence.
cobblemon.species.rockapye.name: Rockapye
cobblemon.species.rockapye.desc: Despite its clumsy appearance, it is a very quick learner if followed step by step. Each Rockapye has a diffferent handprint.
cobblemon.species.troglolith.name: Troglolith
cobblemon.species.troglolith.desc: It is supposed to be the missing evolutionary link. In ancient times, males and females used to raise wild Pokemon in two very different ways.
cobblemon.species.sputnink.name: Sputnink
cobblemon.species.sputnink.desc: Apparently it was found on Earth after a meteor impact. It blends in an ink puddle, then sneaks out to attack.
cobblemon.species.nebyura.name: Nebyura
cobblemon.species.nebyura.desc: A Pokemon from outer space. Using its terrible psychic powers it can drive creatures it establishes mental connection with crazy.
cobblemon.species.birigiri.name: Birigiri
cobblemon.species.birigiri.desc: They swim around thanks to the energy they share with the whole shoal. Due to its high calorie value, Chubiburny is known to be their favorite prey.
cobblemon.species.chubiburny.name: Chubiburny
cobblemon.species.chubiburny.desc: Its pelt contains sugary high-calorie substances. It peacefully basks in the sunlight, ignoring Birigiri's bites.
cobblemon.species.goombear.name: Goombear
cobblemon.species.goombear.desc: It can freely stretch its limbs by burning off everything it has eaten. Before hibernation or when it has no food, it will even burn its own stilts.
cobblemon.species.manticoeur.name: Manticoeur
cobblemon.species.manticoeur.desc: This Pokemon has a moody temper. It lures prey with its sweet face, then sucker punches them using its stinger.
cobblemon.species.fatail.name: Fatail
cobblemon.species.fatail.desc: Extremely slick, it has a tendency to take advantage on its fellows. Only a few Trainers are able to develop a trustful relationship with it.
cobblemon.species.reindear.name: Reindear
cobblemon.species.reindear.desc: It judges the behavior of other Pokemon, then marks them with tags. It rewards with a gift those who have been nice.
cobblemon.species.reindigo.name: Reindigo
cobblemon.species.reindigo.desc: Contrary to popular belief, it is a gentle soul. Actually, the cause for its constantly sullen face seems to lie in the excessive weight of its antlers.
cobblemon.species.sosqwatch.name: Sosqwatch
cobblemon.species.sosqwatch.desc: It wanders around on snowy mountains with its own original style. It assists whoever's been stranded by avalanches and keeps them warm.
cobblemon.species.vroombug.name: Vroombug
cobblemon.species.vroombug.desc: It has an excellent balance and drives around running on a tire. Once that is over worn, it looks for another new one.
cobblemon.species.skravroom.name: Skravroom
cobblemon.species.skravroom.desc: Rival gangs compete for territories in really noisy speed races that make anyone around run away.
cobblemon.species.chikaboo.name: Chikaboo
cobblemon.species.chikaboo.desc: It has to take care of itself from birth. It doesn't know how to provide food yet, so it plays on others' pity to survive.
cobblemon.species.peckabone.name: Peckabone
cobblemon.species.peckabone.desc: It feeds merely on what it steals from predators. First it deters them with the skull-like pattern, then digs into its target.
cobblemon.species.rexquiem.name: Rexquiem
cobblemon.species.rexquiem.desc: Said to only reveal to people and Pokemon about to die to drag them to the afterlife. It is also known as 'the Emissary of the Devil'.
cobblemon.species.scaracno.name: Scaracno
cobblemon.species.scaracno.desc: This Pokemon is supposed to be a physical manifestation of the Bug-type phobia mankind has always had since ancient times.
cobblemon.species.scaracluo.name: Scaracluo
cobblemon.species.scaracluo.desc: The fear of dangers lurking in the darkness, usually seen among children, has somehow spawned this weird Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.scarphasmo.name: Scarphasmo
cobblemon.species.scarphasmo.desc: According to several tales, a mad scientist created this creature by combining parts of different Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.tokakle.name: Tokakle
cobblemon.species.tokakle.desc: It's not graffiti...that's a Pokemon! It mixes up on city walls and mocks on anyone else who comes its way.
cobblemon.species.blue_tokakle.name: Tokakle
cobblemon.species.blue_tokakle.desc1: It's not graffiti...that's a Pokemon! It mixes up on city walls and mocks on anyone else who comes its way.
cobblemon.species.blue_tokakle.name: Tokakle
cobblemon.species.blue_tokakle.desc1: It's not graffiti...that's a Pokemon! It mixes up on city walls and mocks on anyone else who comes its way.
cobblemon.species.green_tokakle.name: Tokakle
cobblemon.species.green_tokakle.desc1: It's not graffiti...that's a Pokemon! It mixes up on city walls and mocks on anyone else who comes its way.
cobblemon.species.yellow_tokakle.name: Tokakle
cobblemon.species.yellow_tokakle.desc1: It's not graffiti...that's a Pokemon! It mixes up on city walls and mocks on anyone else who comes its way.
cobblemon.species.red_tokakle.name: Tokakle
cobblemon.species.red_tokakle.desc1: It's not graffiti...that's a Pokemon! It mixes up on city walls and mocks on anyone else who comes its way.
cobblemon.species.donanas.name: Donanas
cobblemon.species.donanas.desc: This very shy Pokemon rarely counterattacks. When in danger, it withdraws in its shell as hard as steel.
cobblemon.species.chimaooze.name: Chimaooze
cobblemon.species.chimaooze.desc: The most polluted areas of cities are infested by Chimaooze. When they senses danger, they team up together to eliminate the threat.
cobblemon.species.monster_chimaooze.name: Chimaooze
cobblemon.species.bandeon.name: Bandeon
cobblemon.species.bandeon.desc: It can perfectly replicate the sound of any musical instrument. Once it learns a melody, this Pokemon will never forget it.
cobblemon.species.scaleon.name: Scaleon
cobblemon.species.scaleon.desc: It takes flight by spreading its big ears as if they were wings. It viciously threaten anyone who enters its den in the mountains.
cobblemon.species.porygonwes.name: PorygonWES
cobblemon.species.porygonwes.desc: It was updated with the most cutting-edge technology ever created. It was originally meant to be an assistant in PokeWES.
cobblemon.species.electaburst.name: Electaburst
cobblemon.species.electaburst.desc: The excessive energy unleashed during evolution split up its body. It combines thunders and flares to set off terrible explosions all around.
cobblemon.species.chientilly.name: Chientilly
cobblemon.species.chientilly.desc: It secretes ice-fresh cream from its tail. If the quality doesn't match its high requirements, it throws that away.
cobblemon.species.dusmee.name: Dusmee
cobblemon.species.dusmee.desc: It desperates for attention and makes everything with the sole purpose of getting noticed. When it fails, it starts whining as a baby.
cobblemon.species.egohiss.name: Egohiss
cobblemon.species.egohiss.desc: It periodically sheds its skin trying to remove any flaws. Because this process makes Egohiss blind, its tail serves as a radar that senses its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.egorgeon.name: Egorgeon
cobblemon.species.egorgeon.desc: It has a paralyzing glare it refracts through the scales on its body. In this way, it catches prey and dresses them up with its old leather.
cobblemon.species.chiripe.name: Chiripe
cobblemon.species.chiripe.desc: It has the habit of swinging back and forth while hanging upside down on trees. Because of that, it is usually mistaken for a fruit.
cobblemon.species.batnana.name: Batnana
cobblemon.species.batnana.desc: Its diet has changed and now it is trying to take its first steps into hunting. However, it is very clumsy and makes preys slip away.
cobblemon.species.vesperfum.name: Vesperfum
cobblemon.species.vesperfum.desc: It is a perfect hunter. Pretending to be a flower, it waits for preys to approach attracted by its scent, then strikes lightning-fast.
cobblemon.species.croakling.name: Croakling
cobblemon.species.croakling.desc: It uses its fingers as a sling to shoot ignited rocks with its extremely elastic membranes. Its aim is not that good though.
cobblemon.species.bullverin.name: Bullverin
cobblemon.species.bullverin.desc: It membranes toughen up during evolution, turning similar to glass. When it blows up, spits out fiery cannonballs.
cobblemon.species.croakraze.name: Croakraze
cobblemon.species.croakraze.desc: All of its fights is a spectacular show. Surrounded by flames, it melts the glass on its arms, leaving an elegant trail of crystals behind.
cobblemon.species.inflant.name: Inflant
cobblemon.species.inflant.desc: It floats because of its large ears. Really competitive, it always looks for an opponent to challenge in swimming.
cobblemon.species.floatusk.name: Floatusk
cobblemon.species.floatusk.desc: Floatusk will plough into everything and everyone to prove its strength. It swells water to look bigger.
cobblemon.species.swelephant.name: Swelephant
cobblemon.species.swelephant.desc: Before a fight, it pumps water in its muscles to strengthen its fists. However, this power-up has a specific time limit.
cobblemon.species.luxflon.name: Luxflon
cobblemon.species.luxflon.desc: A legendary Pokemon that protects planet Earth. It has full control over nature it can shape at its will.
cobblemon.species.dragalisk.name: Dragalisk
cobblemon.species.dragalisk.desc: Sealed in the Xenoverse, lusting for power. By planting its tail in the ground, it subtracts vital energy from the planet, making it sterile and infertile.
cobblemon.species.dragaliskx.name: DragaliskX
cobblemon.species.dragaliskx.desc: This being, created to replace the Dark Lord, is a concentration of pure Fury energy. Although it's smaller to the original Dragalisk, it's still very powerful and lethal.
cobblemon.species.dielebi.name: Dielebi
cobblemon.species.dielebi.desc: It seems somehow related to Celebi. Unlike its counterpart, Dielebi travels across past and future alternate dimensions.
cobblemon.species.reginalous.name: Reginalous
cobblemon.species.reginalous.desc: Its body is formed by Anomalous energy from various dimensions. It creates strong winds of bright pink color that changes the alterations of each dimension.
cobblemon.species.fyrmite.name: Fyrmite
cobblemon.species.fyrmite.desc: They are most active during the summer and autumn, feeding on leaves and twigs. They get aggravated easily and may sting you, leaving serious burns. They launch themselves like a rocket missile towards their foes.
cobblemon.species.carabomb.name: Carabomb
cobblemon.species.carabomb.desc: They launch themselves into the air like a rocket as a quick escape from enemies. Launch speeds can reach up to 200 MPH. Do not bother Carabomb while they are asleep, they may explode on contact. In festivals, they are often used as firework displays.
cobblemon.species.bombeezle.name: Bombeezle
cobblemon.species.bombeezle.desc: Wild Bombeezle in a swarm can be dangerous. They will carry and drop Carabomb on their enemies if they feel threatened. They launch multiple flaming missiles towards their opponents, leaving them with a bad burn.
cobblemon.species.winvern.name: Winvern
cobblemon.species.winvern.desc: Found only in the northern snowy parts of Avoris, these Pokemon can withstand harsh freezing weather with the help of their thick feathers. They were actually born and raised in the cold as their nests were made with snow. So it's no surprise these Pokemon love to play in the snow.
cobblemon.species.arctalon.name: Arctalon
cobblemon.species.arctalon.desc: They can notice the tiniest of movements with their keen eyes, even from the highest of pine trees of northern Avoris. They developed thick feathers for better protection against the cold weather and their foes. Their talons are made of very hard ice that can pierce through flesh.
cobblemon.species.falcryo.name: Falcryo
cobblemon.species.falcryo.desc: Known to the Avorian people as the Protector of the North, these majestic Pokemon survey their territory from the sky. They shoot out sharp ice-covered feathers towards their targets, never missing them, even from high up in the sky due to their keen eyes and perfect aim.
cobblemon.species.springily.name: Springily
cobblemon.species.springily.desc: Floating at the water's surface, they absorb sunlight for energy. The leaf on top senses changes in the weather. During the spring season, large groups of them can be found in ponds or lakes.
cobblemon.species.faelily.name: Faelily
cobblemon.species.faelily.desc: Faelily are gentle Pokemon. They store water in their leaf-bowl, which they then purify. They share the water with Pokemon in need, and can also be seen watering plants and flowers.
cobblemon.species.skewern.name: Skewern
cobblemon.species.skewern.desc: Residing in trees, they drop down onto enemies below, hitting them with their spike. A large group of them can damage their enemy very badly. They fight with Seedot over territory.
cobblemon.species.pierceed.name: Pierceed
cobblemon.species.pierceed.desc: They developed thick armor to defend against attacks from their rival, Nuzleaf. With their piercing arms, they knock down trees where Nuzleaf reside in within their territory.
cobblemon.species.skowl.name: Skowl
cobblemon.species.skowl.desc: Active during the night, groups of Skowl gather at spots where there is supernatural activity, especially on nights of the full moon when activity is peaked. An old tale says if Skowl are on top your roof during the nights of a full moon, those who reside in the house will be cursed with misfortunes.
cobblemon.species.owlminous.name: Owlminous
cobblemon.species.owlminous.desc: Being caught in the piercing gaze of an Owlminous will leave you paralyzed in fear. They say their soulless glares are them envisioning your demise. Before you can react they disappear into the pitch black sky. They are known as omens of unfortunate events yet to come.
cobblemon.species.mouskrow.name: Mouskrow
cobblemon.species.mouskrow.desc: Stumbling upon a Mouskrow community, you will find burrows in which they live in. To avoid getting lost, they create trails around their area.
