cobblemon.species.serpensync.desc: Serpensync are often mistaken for Rayquaza in the sky due to their long bodies and how fast they dash through the air. They use this speed to catch high flying prey.
cobblemon.species.cocoling.name: Cocoling
cobblemon.species.cocoling.desc: Newborn Cocoling sprout from fallen coconuts on the beach.
cobblemon.species.coconab.name: Coconab
cobblemon.species.coconab.desc: As Cocoling evolves into Coconab, it's shell starts to form a thick layer.
cobblemon.species.cocofested.name: Cocofested
cobblemon.species.cocofested.desc: By the time Coconab evolves into Cocofested, the thickness of its shell becomes rock solid.
cobblemon.species.chimeaura.name: Chimeaura
cobblemon.species.chimeaura.desc: Adapting to the sounds of it's environment can help Chimeaura in battle.
cobblemon.species.raccane.name: Raccane
cobblemon.species.raccane.desc: Raccane often get stuck in dumpsters looking for trash to eat.
cobblemon.species.draccane.name: Draccane
cobblemon.species.draccane.desc: It's said that Raccane that evolve into Draccane have proven to their kind that they can provide for their family.
cobblemon.species.raccolossus.name: Raccolossus
cobblemon.species.raccolossus.desc: It's said that Raccane that evolve into Draccane have proven to their kind that they can provide for their family.
cobblemon.species.baulder.name: Baulder
cobblemon.species.baulder.desc: Baulder has lived in the depths of Mythan for almost 7,000 years. It is said that this Pokemon is incredibly smart.
cobblemon.species.dredrock.name: Dredrock
cobblemon.species.dredrock.desc: Dredrock have one of the toughest coats known in Pokemon history, it's sad the weight of 5,000 tons can't even break it.
cobblemon.species.tekagon.name: Tekagon
cobblemon.species.tekagon.desc: Tekagon are massive Pokemon, barely fitting in many places, this is why they lived far underground for many years.
cobblemon.species.lavee.name: Lavee
cobblemon.species.lavee.desc: Lavee was known for its incredibly fast swimming skills in lava, this Pokemon can handle tempatures up to 750,000,000 degrees.
cobblemon.species.lavare.name: Lavare
cobblemon.species.lavare.desc: Lavee was known for its incredibly fast swimming skills in lava, this Pokemon can handle tempatures up to 750,000,000 degrees.
cobblemon.species.lavarator.name: Lavarator
cobblemon.species.lavarator.desc: Lavarator can break through any substance known to man, the pure heat of its blade arms can saw through titanium.
cobblemon.species.combateon.name: Combateon
cobblemon.species.combateon.desc: Combateon are known for their amazing dojo skills, they are always seen protecting Eevee in the wild.
cobblemon.species.crystaleon.name: Crystaleon
cobblemon.species.crystaleon.desc: Crystaleon is a Pokemon that is made up of many ores, its ores were harvested off its body back in the day.
cobblemon.species.toxeon.name: Toxeon
cobblemon.species.toxeon.desc: Toxeon is known to have some of the deadliest toxins in the world, be sure to not touch its toxic waste dripping from its body.
cobblemon.species.spectreon.name: Spectreon
cobblemon.species.spectreon.desc: After a certain Eevee died, it's body was later found next to a Flareon that had shared it's flame with it and became Spectreon.
cobblemon.species.aereon.name: Aereon
cobblemon.species.aereon.desc: When Mythan was formed, Aereon had to adapt to high altitudes, causing it to become more passive and calm, causing it to learn levitation.
cobblemon.species.duneon.name: Duneon
cobblemon.species.duneon.desc: Duneon have learned to enjoy each others company under all conditions because of how they were raised in caves and tunnels.
cobblemon.species.titaneon.name: Titaneon
cobblemon.species.titaneon.desc: Titaneon are known for their amazing stance, back in war times, Titaneon were used to protect small children.
cobblemon.species.ascenteon.name: Ascenteon
cobblemon.species.ascenteon.desc: Ascenteon were said to roam and protect Mythan back in ancient times, being the only Eevee's capable of using multiple elements at once.
cobblemon.species.sonareon.name: Sonareon
cobblemon.species.sonareon.desc: After a certain Eevee died, it's body was later found next to a Flareon that had shared it's flame with it and became Spectreon.
cobblemon.species.stingeon.name: Stingeon
cobblemon.species.stingeon.desc: Scorpeon can control the poison it delivers from its stingers, it has learned how to utilize its poison.
cobblemon.species.plaineon.name: Plaineon
cobblemon.species.plaineon.desc: Plaineon are more advanced, and powerful versions of Eevee. The fur on its body is said to protect it from the cold.
cobblemon.species.fenrour.name: Fenrour
cobblemon.species.fenrour.desc: Ancient Mythan tells of a tale of three wolves, and Fenrour is seen as the leader of the pack.
cobblemon.species.lihgeri.name: Lihgeri
cobblemon.species.lihgeri.desc: Lihgeri is said to be the guardian of Light, no one has ever seen it in person.
cobblemon.species.freknight.name: Freknight
cobblemon.species.freknight.desc: Freknight is said to be the guardian of Darkness, no one has ever seen it in person.
cobblemon.species.phenelpha.name: Phenelpha
cobblemon.species.phenelpha.desc: A Mythical Pokemon that is said to be the descent of Cresselia, although it seems a bit more evil.
cobblemon.species.hummony.name: Hummony
cobblemon.species.hummony.desc: A Mythical Pokemon that is said to be the descent of Cresselia, although it seems a bit more evil.
cobblemon.species.florcoon.name: Florcoon
cobblemon.species.florcoon.desc: Florcoon are rather energetic Pokemon, who like foraging through small forests for fallen berries and such. They are generally friendly, but upon evolution it can grow a rather aggressive nature. A Florcoon likes nothing better than to walk up to a person's behind and poke them with their horns.
cobblemon.species.bufaroon.name: Bufaroon
cobblemon.species.bufaroon.desc: If trained properly Bufaroon can become great battlers or even gaurd dogs. Through evolution they grow an aggressive nature, but if trained from a Florcoon they can be more of a help. Wild Bufaroons are quite dangerous and warning is given to those who come across any.
cobblemon.species.grandaroon.name: Grandaroon
cobblemon.species.grandaroon.desc: Grandaroon is the final evolution of the grass starter Floracoon. Grandaroon is a great tank in battle. It has less of an aggressive nature than Bufaroon, which allows it to focus on the more important things in life.
cobblemon.species.pyrall.name: Pyrall
cobblemon.species.pyrall.desc: Basically a burning ball of fluff, Pyrall are fearsome battlers that always put 110% into their battles. They rarely befriend people, but if they do that person is a friend for life; Pyrall will fight for them no matter what.
cobblemon.species.baufire.name: Baufire
cobblemon.species.baufire.desc: This Pokemon is said to be the origin of the beliefs of demons, because of their blood red fur and its two horns. However in battle this Pokemon is as strong as a bulldozer and can take down the toughest of foes.
cobblemon.species.inferlauf.name: Inferlauf
cobblemon.species.inferlauf.desc: Inferlauf are hardly ever seen in the wild because of their shy nature. Inferlauf were once poached for their fur. Their long dangling ears sense movement in the Earth, so they can easily hide if they hear footsteps.
cobblemon.species.aquaff.name: Aquaff
cobblemon.species.aquaff.desc: Aquaff loves ramming into buildings to strengthen itself. A great fighter in both the water and on land, Aquaff and its evolutions are known for their Water Pulses, which they send from the orb in the middle of their stomach.
cobblemon.species.aqualf.name: Aqualf
cobblemon.species.aqualf.desc: Out of the other evolved starters of Midamis, Aqualf is probably the calmest and wise. They have great intellect and are extremely loyal to their trainers. Wild Aqualf are usually found by springs and reservoirs, where they love to relax and bathe on the banks.
cobblemon.species.oxatear.name: Oxatear
cobblemon.species.oxatear.desc: A Pokemon that has said to have been recorded in scrolls by Ancient Egyptians. It was said that Oxatear brought rain to those places suffering of famine and plague. This could be true, as Oxatear is well known for their complicated Rain Dances, but no one is 100% sure.
cobblemon.species.mitorch.name: Mitorch
cobblemon.species.taratorcha.name: Taratorcha
cobblemon.species.terramite.name: Terramite
cobblemon.species.terragrip.name: Terragrip
cobblemon.species.geropian.name: Geropian
cobblemon.species.malropian.name: Malropian
cobblemon.species.malropian.desc: Malropian's tail cannot sting, rather, it can spray terrible acid that can melt skin. It's large appearance can be quite intimidating, comparable to Drapion.
cobblemon.species.rabolt.name: Rabolt
cobblemon.species.rabolt.desc: Rabolts are very hyper Pokemon. Though relatively fragile, they are often feared by Trainers for the fact that they will go beyond the bitter end in battle, damaging themselves as much as the opponent to lay a hit.
cobblemon.species.rabullet.name: Rabullet
cobblemon.species.rabullet.desc: Rabullet love charging into things, no matter what. Due to doing, this they have resistance to any recoil damage their brutal charging normally gives. Rabullet may match the speed of bullets themselves and can seriously injure someone by brushing past during these speed-freak moments.
cobblemon.species.flurse.name: Flurse
cobblemon.species.elvile.name: Elvile
cobblemon.species.raniron.name: Raniron
cobblemon.species.raniron.desc: Cute, dainty Pokemon that are often used by girls because of its pretty and sweet appearence. But don't judge Raniron on its appearance as they put up a fight and can hold their own, even for such small Pokemon. Raniron, despite being the offspring of Steelke are also looked after by Stantler who accompany the group.
cobblemon.species.steelke.name: Steelke
cobblemon.species.vauxee.name: Vauxee
cobblemon.species.vauxee.desc: Cute and lazy Pokemon, who are very unaware of the power they posses. They often flurry around and scoot up sand, looking for treasure and such. Vauxee are very adventurous and love having fun.
cobblemon.species.vauxelle.name: Vauxelle
cobblemon.species.vauxelle.desc: Vauxelle are associated with both the sun and the moon and appear to be strongest when the luminaries are at the highest point in the sky. Because Vauxelle only need to sleep when neither the moon or sun is shining, they are usually full of energy, much like their pre-evolution counterpart.
cobblemon.species.vacute.name: Vacute
cobblemon.species.vacule.name: Vacule
cobblemon.species.veefere.name: Veefere
cobblemon.species.chaust.name: Chaust
cobblemon.species.charmir.name: Charmir
cobblemon.species.sambranaust.name: Sambranaust
cobblemon.species.sambranaust.desc: Sambranaust's intimidating appearance may put off trainers from raising it, but don't be fooled. It merely wants to have a good time and relax with those who take good care of it.
cobblemon.species.cloflower.name: Cloflower
cobblemon.species.cloflower.desc: These gentle Pokemon can often be seen digging for roots underneath the soil of forests and even jungles. They are not aware of their psychic powers but that doesn't stop them from trying.
cobblemon.species.petafleur.name: Petafleur
cobblemon.species.petafleur.desc: Upon evolution, Petafleur are confident in its new awakened power and trusts itself more than it did as a Cloflower. Petafleur has attacks that most Pokemon of the same type wouldn't and this gives it a great advantage in battle.
cobblemon.species.florown.name: Florown
cobblemon.species.florown.desc: Florown is for those trainers who like weird, but powerful Pokemon. Florown is in the same league as Mr. Mime, but are considered a lot stronger. Florown are fully in control of its psychic abilities and are often shown off in touring circuses.
cobblemon.species.earwick.name: Earwick
cobblemon.species.earmor.name: Earmor
cobblemon.species.veneedle.name: Veneedle
cobblemon.species.poisapine.name: Poisapine
cobblemon.species.doree.name: Doree
cobblemon.species.doree.desc: Much like Diglett, Doree is a earth-moving Pokemon. People have made exhibits where you can visit tunnels, which Doree famalies have made, and find rare Pokmon underground, but not for capture.
cobblemon.species.dawreel.name: Dawreel
cobblemon.species.dawreel.desc: These Pokemon are known for their steel maces, which can be devastating. They are quite the offensive Pokemon, however they lack in special moves. But what they lack in special they make up for in resistance and Dawreel are one of the toughest Pokemon out there.
cobblemon.species.minrok.name: Minrok
cobblemon.species.minrok.desc: Minrok are mossy Pokemon traits of Grass-types but are Poison / Rock types. They absorb light and are also fond of damp areas where they multiply very quickly and easily. They like to speed demonically through open fields, exhausting gases while doing it.
cobblemon.species.minryde.name: Minryde
cobblemon.species.birred.name: Birred
cobblemon.species.birred.desc: Birred like to collect things, it differs per Birred what they're after but every single Birred has an obsession which can be quite annoying for passing trainers, because it's impossible to tell what object they have to keep pocketed.
cobblemon.species.birryde.name: Birryde
cobblemon.species.birryde.desc: Birryde match the speeds of fighter jet planes and these Pokemon are often used by such people to practice with. They are extremely loyal and people compare this to a Pidgeot. Alas, they still have a nack for 'picking up' loose objects.
cobblemon.species.tweetrille.name: Tweetrille
cobblemon.species.woodtryle.name: Woodtryle
cobblemon.species.biduane.name: Biduane
cobblemon.species.biduane.desc: Bidaune are referenced in a legend which states they were once small flying Pokemon like Pidgey and Spearow who wanted to be free and fly wherever they went, supposedly leaving their bodies to do so.
cobblemon.species.bidengel.name: Bidengel
cobblemon.species.bidengel.desc: Angelic in appearance, Bidengel are shy and caring Pokemon. The size of their disk on top of their halo represents the wisdom of the Bidengel, usually increasing with age. Bidengel don't often come down from the clouds and it is said that because they don't breathe, they can fly all the way to space.
cobblemon.species.bidread.name: Bidread
cobblemon.species.bidread.desc: Bidread were once thought to be messengers of a bad omen, using the orb they carry for fortune telling. A young man would train a Bidaune before his wedding, and if it evolved in to a Bidengel he would be blessed in marriage, but cursed if it evolved in to a Bidread. Such myths have long since died out, however.
cobblemon.species.childer.name: Childer
cobblemon.species.childer.desc: Sweet, chirpy Pokemon that are seen only at winter in the cold snow where they nestle together in straw nests high up in trees. Small enough to perch on your hand, Childer are great pets and love nothing better than sitting by a fire in the winter cold.
cobblemon.species.norewin.name: Norewin
cobblemon.species.norewin.desc: Norewin are hardy Ice-types because of its high defenses. Norewin are also only seen in the harsh winters or in cold areas in the mountains. They have dragon-like features, but retain the some bird-like features from Childer. To protect themselves, they can freeze themselves in an impenetrable amount of ice.
cobblemon.species.lauves.name: Lauves
cobblemon.species.lauvered.name: Lauvered
cobblemon.species.lauvader.name: Lauvader
cobblemon.species.raunny.name: Raunny
cobblemon.species.raunny.desc: Most definitely the fastest family of Rock Pokemon known so far. These Pokemon combine their agility with their brute force to knock down opponents in a flash. Raunny are found mostly in mountains where they feed on vegetation, although are also sometimes known to eat pebbles.
cobblemon.species.raudren.name: Raudren
cobblemon.species.raudren.desc: An extremely aggressive Pokemon that lives among the highest mountains and inside the lowest valleys of the world. Not the friendliest of Pokemon, Raudren are known to shatter buildings with their hard head.
cobblemon.species.unmol.name: Unmol
cobblemon.species.minole.name: Minole
cobblemon.species.grannole.name: Grannole
cobblemon.species.proseed.name: Proseed
cobblemon.species.proseed.desc: Proseed are known to let themselves get carried away by light breezes, both out of fear for their lives and trying to find a proper space to grow and develop.
cobblemon.species.tulipro.name: Tulipro
cobblemon.species.tulipro.desc: Proseed has blossomed into Tulipro, now becoming much more carefree instead of worrisome. If attacked, it will likely take a few seconds for it to even register the pain.
cobblemon.species.felefox.name: Felefox
cobblemon.species.valvette.name: Valvette
cobblemon.species.rewt.name: Rewt
cobblemon.species.salrander.name: Salrander
cobblemon.species.tumbeaver.name: Tumbeaver
cobblemon.species.tumbeaver.desc: Tumbeaver roll around all day, it is in fact, one of the few things they do, if a Tumbeaver doesn't get stopped by an occasional tree or rock it can become a very devestating ball that wrecks everything in it's path.
cobblemon.species.kremcee.name: Kremcee
cobblemon.species.kremcee.desc: This Pokemon is friendly compared to most other Dark types. Whenever they meet new people or Pokemon they always bow and hands with arm-like ears. They look pretty slow because of that C-shaped rock on their head, but deceptively run pretty fast.
cobblemon.species.haleet.name: Haleet
cobblemon.species.haleet.desc: Haleet are protected by a strange shield, the origins of the shield are unconfirmed, as is much about this Pokemon. What is known, is that they can be quite aggressive, although that is partly due to the style of training they do with their Trainers.
cobblemon.species.chulee.name: Chulee
cobblemon.species.chanalee.name: Chanalee
cobblemon.species.chislee.name: Chislee
cobblemon.species.kintee.name: Kintee
cobblemon.species.kinett.name: Kinett
cobblemon.species.kinettee.name: Kinettee
cobblemon.species.fai.name: Fai
cobblemon.species.pafrei.name: Pafrei
cobblemon.species.freil.name: Freil
cobblemon.species.faipan.name: Faipan
cobblemon.species.pangel.name: Pangel
cobblemon.species.gurangle.name: Gurangle
cobblemon.species.liotee.name: Liotee
cobblemon.species.leeverge.name: Leeverge
cobblemon.species.irise.name: Irise
cobblemon.species.irise.desc: These Pokemon are deaf but are excellent lip readers. Irise and their Trainers have a true bond because of the level of trust both must have in the heat of battle.
cobblemon.species.yeraze.name: Yeraze
cobblemon.species.yeraze.desc: Yeraze are still deaf but they use their other senses to battle. Their sight is extremely impeccable, with sight that is better than humans. They can also sense vibrations occasionally digging their claws into the ground; this is also allows them to ground Electric attacks.
cobblemon.species.sharmor.name: Sharmor
cobblemon.species.sharmaul.name: Sharmaul
cobblemon.species.sevris.name: Sevris
cobblemon.species.cradvris.name: Cradvris
cobblemon.species.floatate.name: Floatate
cobblemon.species.fleetade.name: Fleetade
cobblemon.species.valiade.name: Valiade
cobblemon.species.causit.name: Causit
cobblemon.species.causit.desc: Not the most mobile of Pokemon, Causit is just a nuisance both on water andon land. Its not the most useful Pokemon either, but when it evolves, this changes.
cobblemon.species.cassidite.name: Cassidite
cobblemon.species.cassidite.desc: The family of Cassidite is the only bird-like Pokemon capable of battling underwater. Although it is a good battler on land, it prefers the water as its streamlined appearance gives it a good advantage against Pokemon such as Mantine.
cobblemon.species.cascassidine.name: Cascassidine
cobblemon.species.cascassidine.desc: A feared underwater being that feeds by plucking Flying-types from the surface, drowning them before feeding on them. They are fearsome battlers and not to be taken lightly. Their plumage is water-resistant to increase speed in water, also working to repel Water-type attacks during battle.
cobblemon.species.glauvee.name: Glauvee
cobblemon.species.glaufang.name: Glaufang
cobblemon.species.glaure.name: Glaure
cobblemon.species.criwely.name: Criwely
cobblemon.species.crauwly.name: Crauwly
cobblemon.species.craud.name: Craud
cobblemon.species.preano.name: Preano
cobblemon.species.prarendo.name: Prarendo
cobblemon.species.paradeano.name: Paradeano
cobblemon.species.paradeano.desc: Paradeano's bulbs are full of pure energy, capable of powering cities when given proper care. When angered, they're known to burst in chaotic displays of electrical bolts.
cobblemon.species.flawsy.name: Flawsy
cobblemon.species.flawepsi.name: Flawepsi
cobblemon.species.psiantor.name: Psiantor
cobblemon.species.dratt.name: Dratt
cobblemon.species.drowler.name: Drowler
cobblemon.species.foratt.name: Foratt
cobblemon.species.breame.name: Breame
cobblemon.species.breame.desc: An artificial Pokemon only capable of producing beam-based attacks. Breame are fond of mirrors and will fire them gleefully from it’s snout.
cobblemon.species.awespark.name: Awespark
cobblemon.species.awesurge.name: Awesurge
cobblemon.species.awesurge.desc: These speedy yet large Pokemon never set foot on the ground. They are seen competing with other’s of it’s kind, appearing as light trails, as they race and battle for dominance.
cobblemon.species.kwauwk.name: Kwauwk
cobblemon.species.kwauwk.desc: These Pokemon are well-known for their odd assortment of attack types. Kwauwk is said to shift type entirely when they lose focus, but this has been unproven.
cobblemon.species.quwauzrel.name: Quwauzrel
cobblemon.species.quwauzrel.desc: Even more bizarre than Kwauwk, this Pokemon is found rarely in the wild, racing across the land emitting unsettling cries. It’s said to wildly change type when startled.
cobblemon.species.enlune.name: Enlune
cobblemon.species.enlune.desc: Enlune is a clawed Pokemon that enjoys fireworks and anything related to light. They have a fascination with mirrors and whenever one is near, they are seen gazing into it.
cobblemon.species.petri.name: Petri
cobblemon.species.petri.desc: Petri are natural shy Pokemon. In a pinch, they will fluff up their tail feathers to intimidate their foes.
cobblemon.species.petricus.name: Petricus
cobblemon.species.petricus.desc: Petricus's beautiful tail feathers dazzle many of it's onlookers. It's also known to use them offensively, to make it's prey to feel cornered.
cobblemon.species.craura.name: Craura
cobblemon.species.craura.desc: Craura are odd among Dark-types, becoming active during the day. They are reflexive Pokemon, using their opponent’s power against them.
cobblemon.species.hindawn.name: Hindawn
cobblemon.species.hindawn.desc: Hindawn is known to predict the near future for those who manage to best it in battle, although it's rumored that it can change the future for the worse as well.
cobblemon.species.grizzik.name: Grizzik
cobblemon.species.grizzik.desc: Grizzik are such aggressive Pokemon, that they don’t rest or tire. The only time they rest is in Winter, where they hibernate until Spring.
cobblemon.species.moucroon.name: Moucroon
cobblemon.species.moucroon.desc: A vicious Pokemon that hibernates during the Spring. If awoke during it’s 3 month hibernation, it will hunt down the one who awoke it relentlessly.
cobblemon.species.kujee.name: Kujee
cobblemon.species.buarajee.name: Buarajee
cobblemon.species.dauvall.name: Dauvall
cobblemon.species.dauvall.desc: An extremely strange Pokemon that has an attack of almost every type. Unfortunately they are probably the most annoying attacks and so that's how Dauvall got its classification.
cobblemon.species.feefish.name: Feefish
cobblemon.species.fencette.name: Fencette
cobblemon.species.feegremin.name: Feegremin
cobblemon.species.feegremin.desc: Feegremin has a vicious temper that it looses in battle. It gets easily enraged on top of this, especially when it ‘s up against stronger foes.
cobblemon.species.karmean.name: Karmean
cobblemon.species.hailoman.name: Hailoman
cobblemon.species.inferaid.name: Inferaid
cobblemon.species.davolee.name: Davolee
cobblemon.species.davolee.desc: Davolee are said to be the offspring of Psyduck and some other Bird Pokemon. The flail wildly when attacked. They are like Eevee, and they evolve three ways into three very different Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.dauriasse.name: Dauriasse
cobblemon.species.dauriasse.desc: This Pokemon aggressive Pokemon has brutal strength, but doesn't really have heavy-hitting attacks. When angry they spit balls of fire and smoke literally comes out of its ears.
cobblemon.species.poiriasse.name: Poiriasse
cobblemon.species.poiriasse.desc: Poiriasse are always surrounded by a layer of dust, which is a mix of poison and ice. Any Pokemon or person who comes into physical contact with the layer is most likely to become poisoned and frozen.
cobblemon.species.groviasse.name: Groviasse
cobblemon.species.groviasse.desc: Probably the most secretive of the Davolee evolution, Groviasse is only seen in thick forests or dense jungles. They are sometimes seen jumping from tree to tree and their hands have adapted for this travel.
cobblemon.species.denruu.name: Denruu
cobblemon.species.adeerex.name: Adeerex
cobblemon.species.adeerex.desc: Adeerex was known for devouring entire Pokemon whole in it's prime, although as Pokemon dwindled, it lost it's food source as well and eventually fell to the wayside.
cobblemon.species.leebrio.name: Leebrio
cobblemon.species.leebrey.name: Leebrey
cobblemon.species.leeceri.name: Leeceri
cobblemon.species.kiell.name: Kiell
cobblemon.species.kiriliel.name: Kiriliel
cobblemon.species.kivirial.name: Kivirial
cobblemon.species.mesopolin.name: Mesopolin
cobblemon.species.kaplantis.name: Kaplantis
cobblemon.species.luceyan.name: Luceyan
cobblemon.species.kamiyin.name: Kamiyin
cobblemon.species.balas.name: Balas
cobblemon.species.pubble.name: Pubble
cobblemon.species.bouldog.name: Bouldog
cobblemon.species.vinagruff.name: Vinagruff
cobblemon.species.punibara.name: Punibara
cobblemon.species.punibara.desc: Due to their unfussy diet, Punibara were able to populate almost every habitat in Okeno. Their favorite food is berries, and they play an important role in the dispersion of seeds.
cobblemon.species.dopibara.name: Dopibara
cobblemon.species.dopibara.desc: Dopibara's body is so sturdy that it can withstand attacks without even noticing. Because of this, it is oblivious to its surroundings and only cares about eating and sleeping.
cobblemon.species.coathief.name: Coathief
cobblemon.species.coathief.desc: Coathief form packs that live in the woods. At night, they run rampage and invade the nearest city or town, stealing food and items from any Pokemon or trainer they encounter.
cobblemon.species.darskarf.name: Darskarf
cobblemon.species.darskarf.desc: If your mail never arrives, it might be Darskarf's fault! They are known to steal packages to try and find shiny objects. Sometimes, they will loot eachother's stashes and start fighting.
cobblemon.species.inscribble.name: Inscribble
cobblemon.species.inscribble.desc: Inscribble's diet requires substances found in ink that is produced in Okeno. When it overfeeds, its feet release any excess ink as it skitters around, leaving trails behind.
cobblemon.species.pupage.name: Pupage
cobblemon.species.beetome.name: Beetome
cobblemon.species.beetome.desc: It's said that when Beetome eat books, they become smarter. A lot of trainers feed them dictionaries and literature classics because of this, but there is no scientific proof for that.
cobblemon.species.hatchick.name: Hatchick
cobblemon.species.hatchick.desc: This timid Pokemon only feels safe if it is wearing its eggshell, and it will boldly drive off children that reach for its head. Trainers are always confused seeing them hatch.
cobblemon.species.scuffowl.name: Scuffowl
cobblemon.species.rudester.name: Rudester
cobblemon.species.boileror.name: Boileror
cobblemon.species.boileror.desc: It leaps from the top of sea cliffs directly into its prey with amazing force. Although it may seem dangerous, its sturdy body protects it from damage from the rocks. The flames on its face grow brighter the older it gets.
cobblemon.species.ookawatt.name: Ookawatt
cobblemon.species.ookawatt.desc: Ookawatt's swimming capabilities are unmatched. It chases prey restlessly and finishes them off with electric attacks that are extremely dangerous underwater.
cobblemon.species.feygon.name: Feygon
cobblemon.species.feygon.desc: At night, they search the grasslands and destroy any four-leaf clover they find. It is said they look for lucky people and try to ruin their lives.
cobblemon.species.maligon.name: Maligon
cobblemon.species.maligon.desc: Its vicious attitude makes it extremely hard to form a bond with. It takes a skilled trainer to make a Maligon value them as partners.
cobblemon.species.caballgon.name: Caballgon
cobblemon.species.caballgon.desc: Caballgon's breath is capable of making flowers whither and trees perish. After stomping the ground with its hooved feet, this Pokemon lifts off and flies.
cobblemon.species.squeezoa.name: Squeezoa
cobblemon.species.squeezoa.desc: The underside of its body is composed of many poisonous tentacles and frills — touching them results in stinging pain. However, it is a gentle Pokemon and people have learned to ride it across the seas.
cobblemon.species.lepikite.name: Lepikite
cobblemon.species.lepikite.desc: Lepikite spin sticky silk that can be attached to any surface to avoid being carried by the wind. Children will often play with them and attempt to cut their threads.
cobblemon.species.kitweed.name: Kitweed
cobblemon.species.kitweed.desc: Kitweed use their thick fur to shield themselves from rain. They prefer warmer climate and are always seen playing during the summer.
cobblemon.species.felifluff.name: Felifluff
cobblemon.species.felifluff.desc: Their playful but elegant behavior makes them the most popular Pokemon among high-society. Brushing its fur improves not only its looks, but also its battling capabilities.
cobblemon.species.empurroar.name: Empurroar
cobblemon.species.empurroar.desc: It scatters spores and dust from its fluffy mane. The spores are said to give origin to new Kitweed as soon as they happen to touch the ground.
cobblemon.species.puppug.name: Puppug
cobblemon.species.puppug.desc: Puppug love eating. Whenever they smell their favourite food they become agitated and start wiggling their tails. If you don't give them what they want, they'll spew flames.
cobblemon.species.boshishe.name: Boshishe
cobblemon.species.boshishe.desc: Boshishe eat more than 50 pounds of food every day. Keeping one as a pet is no easy task because of their never-ending appetite. In spite of this, they make incredibly loyal partners.
cobblemon.species.nyanyum.name: Nyanyum
cobblemon.species.nyanyum.desc: Their fur is silky and has a glimmering appearance when under light. They wag their star-shaped tails during nights when the moon is full, and become lethargic when its not visible.
cobblemon.species.yummyan.name: Yummyan
cobblemon.species.grubait.name: Grubait
cobblemon.species.grubait.desc: It falls common prey to Flying-types such as Kisadee. Fishermen are sometimes caught using Grubait as lure, claiming it brings them better fish Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.chococoon.name: Chococoon
cobblemon.species.chococoon.desc: Its rock-hard shell is delicious, but almost impossible to eat. Its color darkens as it gets closer to evolving.
cobblemon.species.bombeetle.name: Bombeetle
cobblemon.species.bombeetle.desc: All the energy stored while it was Chococoon is converted into this Pokemon's intense fighting spirit. It attacks with mighty punches.
cobblemon.species.popkern.name: Popkern
cobblemon.species.popkern.desc: This Pokemon's organism is mostly composed of water and thus is very sensible to changes in the weather. If Popkern ever reaches elevated temperatures, it will evolve.
cobblemon.species.pipkorn.name: Pipkorn
cobblemon.species.pipkorn.desc: Pipkorn's flames are constantly consuming the oxygen around it. It moves frenetically and can barely stay still for long. Its hard to determine if it's in pain or not.
cobblemon.species.frirate.name: Frirate
cobblemon.species.frirate.desc: They need their parents to bring them fish to eat and loudly cry when hungry. This reveals their location to predators, and the results are tragic.
cobblemon.species.piratross.name: Piratross
cobblemon.species.piratross.desc: Although menacing, Piratross cannot hunt for themselves. Instead, they steal food caught by other Pokemon, trying to scare them with screeches and then battling if necessary.
cobblemon.species.albagross.name: Albagross
cobblemon.species.albagross.desc: Ulike Piratross, Albagross are great at hunting. This doesn't stop them from stealing food from other Pokemon, however, and they are even more relentless when doing so.
cobblemon.species.piglitt.name: Piglitt
cobblemon.species.piglitt.desc: They play in mud pits during hot days. By doing so, their skin becomes thicker and more resistant to attacks. Children love to chase Piglitt, because they get easily startled.
cobblemon.species.porklay.name: Porklay
cobblemon.species.javernaut.name: Javernaut
cobblemon.species.javernaut.desc: Javernaut are employed in farms and, more rarely, in construction sites, to help with the heavy work. A hit from its club-like tail can knock down trees.
cobblemon.species.reekoral.name: Reekoral
cobblemon.species.reekoral.desc: Despite its cute appearance, this Pokemon's fangs carry a deadly venom. Its rattle and bright colors...
cobblemon.species.bleakonda.name: Bleakonda
cobblemon.species.bleakonda.desc: It constricts prey and eats them whole. The extremely corrosive acids in its stomach will destroy the body so that the nutrients can be absorbed.
cobblemon.species.ignew.name: Ignew
cobblemon.species.ignew.desc: It is said new Ignew appear whenever a volcano erupts. Scientists believe they are formed deep inside the Earth's crust.
cobblemon.species.metarock.name: Metarock
cobblemon.species.metarock.desc: Pressure and temperature have transformed Ignew's rock exterior into a thougher crust. Metarock is even capable of taking explosions without being damaged at all.
cobblemon.species.beherode.name: Beherode
cobblemon.species.beherode.desc: The rock layer covering its body is constantly eroding into thin sand. Beherode uses its huge arms to create dens inside caves by crushing rock, where they raise Ignew.
cobblemon.species.tintap.name: Tintap
cobblemon.species.tintap.desc: These Pokemon's markings shine dimly in the darkness of caves. Different patterns have been documented already, although extremely rare.
cobblemon.species.taprint.name: Taprint
cobblemon.species.taprint.desc: Curse Ghost Moonlight Fairy Wish Normal Magic Coat Psychic Skill Swap Psychic Ally Switch Psychic Spotlight Normal
cobblemon.species.carcahawk.name: Carcahawk
cobblemon.species.carcahawk.desc: Theorized to have migrated from a faraway region, Carcahawk can fly at amazing speeds. Not only that, the fire from its wings lets it adjust the pressure of air currents, which gives it more control when soaring.
cobblemon.species.dormie.name: Dormie
cobblemon.species.dormie.desc: Sand or dust that comes in contact with Dormie gain wondrous proprieties known for making people fall asleep. Doctors recommend it for treating insomnia.
cobblemon.species.dreamie.name: Dreamie
cobblemon.species.dreamie.desc: This Pokemon moves as if it is leaping through the air, leading herds of Dormie. It also lulls people into sleep with the trail of magic dust it leaves behind.
cobblemon.species.sicada.name: Sicada
cobblemon.species.sicada.desc: Sicada send telepathic frequencies to gather in groups of three that sing together until one evolves. The remaining duo has to search for a new partner.
cobblemon.species.maestring.name: Maestring
cobblemon.species.maestring.desc: It vibrates its antenna to communicate with others of its kind. By moving its arm in certain patterns, it can make Sicada sing in modulated ways.
cobblemon.species.oxessory.name: Oxessory
cobblemon.species.inspark.name: Inspark
cobblemon.species.inspark.desc: - SingeSTAB Fire 3 Smokescreen Normal 7 EmberSTAB Fire 11 Smog Poison 16 Endure Normal 23 Flame BurstSTAB Fire 35 Explosion Normal 37 Powder Bug
cobblemon.species.flantern.name: Flantern
cobblemon.species.artifire.name: Artifire
cobblemon.species.explosipede.name: Explosipede
cobblemon.species.infurnace.name: Infurnace
cobblemon.species.infurnace.desc: Infurnace are known for their temper. They cause a lot of trouble during Christmas Eve, launching hot coal at any moving target.
cobblemon.species.plurshie.name: Plurshie
cobblemon.species.plurshie.desc: If it's left alone for too long, it will throw a tantrum. Plurshie are traditionally given as gifts to young trainers in carnivals and fairs.
cobblemon.species.phantoshie.name: Phantoshie
cobblemon.species.phantoshie.desc: Many claim this Pokemon gives the best hugs. It's hard to gain one's trust, however, and because of this, people seen with Phantoshie are considered caring trainers.
cobblemon.species.pawstiche.name: Pawstiche
cobblemon.species.pawstiche.desc: This Pokemon is startled by any loud noise or sudden movent. However, it also tends to scare others because of its frightening looks. The fur it sheds is commonly used as stuffing in toys.
cobblemon.species.bugaloo.name: Bugaloo
cobblemon.species.bugaloo.desc: It can only move by hopping around. Bugaloo can juggle up to around twenty berries when happy.
cobblemon.species.juggaloo.name: Juggaloo
cobblemon.species.juggaloo.desc: Its nimble movements make it almost impossible to hit.
cobblemon.species.fountide.name: Fountide
cobblemon.species.fountide.desc: It absorbs the humidity in the air, which exits its body through its tail. After it has attached itself to a surface using its suction cup, it's impossible to remove it by force.
cobblemon.species.troupican.name: Troupican
cobblemon.species.defecash.name: Defecash
cobblemon.species.defecash.desc: - Flytrap FangSTAB Grass - Vortex Drain Water - Whirlpool Water - TwisterSTAB Dragon - Dragon BreathSTAB Dragon - OutrageSTAB Dragon - Nature's Call Grass
cobblemon.species.frutifeye.name: Frutifeye
cobblemon.species.guaraneye.name: Guaraneye
cobblemon.species.guaraneye.desc: Hypnosis Psychic Wish Normal Psycho Shift Psychic Stored PowerSTAB Psychic Hex Ghost
cobblemon.species.coastone.name: Coastone
cobblemon.species.coastone.desc: Coastone dig small caves, which end up serving as home for fish Pokemon. Although they seem to be covered in sand, they just have a rough spongy skin.
cobblemon.species.sandieval.name: Sandieval
cobblemon.species.sandieval.desc: Sandieval's body is so heavy that it cannot even move properly. Some sailors use them as anchors.
cobblemon.species.desplash.name: Desplash
cobblemon.species.desplash.desc: They love to cannonball from high cliffs and make huge splashes. The shape of their snouts gives them extra speed when surfing through waves.
cobblemon.species.desbrine.name: Desbrine
cobblemon.species.desbrine.desc: Desbrine use warm ocean currents to travel inbetween regions. It only comes to Okeno during summer.
cobblemon.species.destropod.name: Destropod
cobblemon.species.destropod.desc: It is said when angered, they can whip up tsunamis at will. Surfers enjoy having Destropod as company, because they secrete a film that acts as an excellent sunscreen.
cobblemon.species.egcite.name: Egcite
cobblemon.species.egcite.desc: Children find them extremely cute, but Egcite are timid—if anyone approaches, they will run away immediately. People say if you were to able to look at the sun, you'd see this Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.egxel.name: Egxel
cobblemon.species.egxel.desc: Using their powerful feet, these Pokemon are capable of jumping over a whole two-story house! In a popular fairy tale, Egxel leapt over the sun to have its trainer's wish granted.
cobblemon.species.egxiking.name: Egxiking
cobblemon.species.egxiking.desc: This Pokemon rules over Egcite and Egxel. When approaching its burrow, you may feel the temperature become slightly warmer. It tries to create the perfect environment for its eggs to hatch.
cobblemon.species.bboing.name: B-boing
cobblemon.species.tutu.name: Tutu
cobblemon.species.lundrey.name: Lundrey
cobblemon.species.lundrey.desc: Lundrey naturally exhale a pungent sweat-like smell. Keeping one indoors is usually seen as a problem, but some people seem to not mind it.
cobblemon.species.dirthrown.name: Dirthrown
cobblemon.species.dirthrown.desc: It is coated by what appears to be some sort of water-proofing powder. These Pokemon are helpful to slouchy home owners, because Dirthrown absorb all the dirt and dust around them.
cobblemon.species.duolecule.name: Duolecule
cobblemon.species.duolecule.desc: Its body constantly changes in appearance due to the intriguing way its molecules are arranged. In this form, Duolecule's squishy body can squeeze through small holes.
cobblemon.species.valvacid.name: Valvacid
cobblemon.species.valvacid.desc: If it lashes its arms onto its prey, it will either pump corrosive acids to finish it or drain its life energy. It spits red sludge when angered.
cobblemon.species.larvomit.name: Larvomit
cobblemon.species.larvomit.desc: Its eggs are laid inside tree trunks. After it hatches, Larvomit will feed on that tree and make it wither over time. Some forests are completely taken over.
cobblemon.species.drogaster.name: Drogaster
cobblemon.species.drogaster.desc: Drogaster are the result of a failed experiment that employed genetic coding. It's had a terrible impact on the environment, but the Pokemon has no intentions of harm.
cobblemon.species.mycerial.name: Mycerial
cobblemon.species.mycerial.desc: It scatters white spores that have a sweet aroma to attract prey. Although tempting, people should not inhale them, as they coat the throat and cause bad coughing.
cobblemon.species.unfortunist.name: Unfortunist
cobblemon.species.unfortunist.desc: Upon evolving, it no longer uses spores to lure prey. Unfortunist infect roots in the forest, which allows them to control them to ensnare and drag Pokemon to their location.
cobblemon.species.dullahaunt.name: Dullahaunt
cobblemon.species.dullahaunt.desc: A tale describes the story of a woman whose sprit was forced to roam as a ghostly beast. People all over Okeno associate that tale with Dullahaunt.
cobblemon.species.ombrella.name: Ombrella
cobblemon.species.ombrella.desc: It manipulates water with its lolling tongue and can make it rain at will. Ombrella are often misunderstood as bringers of bad luck.
cobblemon.species.carnation.name: Carnation
cobblemon.species.carnation.desc: - Follow Me Normal - Rage Normal 3 Heal Block Psychic 5 Razor LeafSTAB Grass 8 Grass KnotSTAB Grass 11 Vital ThrowSTAB Fighting 15 Helping Hand Normal 19 Seismic TossSTAB Fighting 24 Magical LeafSTAB Grass 29 Tearful Look Normal 32 Storm ThrowSTAB Fighting 35 Grassy Terrain Grass 39 CounterSTAB Fighting 43 Flower Shield Fairy 50 Petal BlizzardSTAB Grass 56 Rage Powder Bug
cobblemon.species.corsage.name: Rose
cobblemon.species.selveger.name: Selveger
cobblemon.species.hoatrex.name: Hoatrex
cobblemon.species.gnetic.name: G-netic
cobblemon.species.gnetic.desc: A strange Pokemon created in a lab. It's cellular structure was made incredibly stable, so it began to be used in a variety of tests.
cobblemon.species.nimbleaf.name: Nimbleaf
cobblemon.species.nimbleaf.desc: If it is starving, it will eat its own leaf as sustenance. Apparently, the leaf doesn't taste very good.
cobblemon.species.leafrond.name: Leafrond
cobblemon.species.leafrond.desc: Be careful not to approach this Pokemon when it is angry. Its leaf is sharp enough to cut through bone.
cobblemon.species.syleafid.name: Syleafid
cobblemon.species.syleafid.desc: The leaf on its tail is just as sharp as the leaves on its back. Its leaves can cut through even solid steel.
cobblemon.species.peyero.name: Peyero
cobblemon.species.peyero.desc: While awake, its body is always burning hot. However, it cools down to room temperature while sleeping.
cobblemon.species.infiris.name: Infiris
cobblemon.species.infiris.desc: The shell covering the surface of its body can be opened slightly. Inside the shell, its body is soft.
cobblemon.species.astignite.name: Astignite
cobblemon.species.astignite.desc: This Pokemon was once the key to ending an ancient war. It relaxes by taking a bath in molten lava.
cobblemon.species.liquiput.name: Liquiput
cobblemon.species.liquiput.desc: Its body is made of liquid, so droughts pose a great danger to it. It is always found close to a source of water.
cobblemon.species.hydrush.name: Hydrush
cobblemon.species.hydrush.desc: It can run on top of the water’s surface. However, it is not very fast when walking on land.
cobblemon.species.correncid.name: Correncid
cobblemon.species.correncid.desc: A mysterious Pokemon that connects this world and the next. Anyone who follows it to the next world will not return.
cobblemon.species.takuni.name: Takuni
cobblemon.species.takuni.desc: Its stomach produces a thumping sound when hit. Some Takuni play their own stomachs like drums.
cobblemon.species.percussoon.name: Percussoon
cobblemon.species.percussoon.desc: Sitrus Berries are its favorite food. When it goes on a long trip, it brings some as a snack.
cobblemon.species.cupricorn.name: Cupricorn
cobblemon.species.cupricorn.desc: Its body may be small, but the elegant horn on its head is as hard as steel and can land powerful strikes.
cobblemon.species.hornikel.name: Hornikel
cobblemon.species.hornikel.desc: Due to its ability to withstand even harsh environments, it makes a very useful companion for Pokemon Rangers.
cobblemon.species.goabalt.name: Goabalt
cobblemon.species.goabalt.desc: It has a much more violent nature than Hornikel. Its sharp hooves and three hard horns are threatening.
cobblemon.species.cuppa.name: Cuppa
cobblemon.species.cuppa.desc: It likes to float by the waterside with most of its body underwater, making itself look like just a white ball.
cobblemon.species.kapwondo.name: Kapwondo
cobblemon.species.kapwondo.desc: The secret technique behind its strength is that it twists its waist around whenever it launches an attack.
cobblemon.species.dorfin.name: Dorfin
cobblemon.species.dorfin.desc: The left and right sides of its brain take turns sleeping, so it is active at all times.
cobblemon.species.darca.name: Darca
cobblemon.species.darca.desc: It is called 'The Underwater Hunter.' It mercilessly attacks anything that enters its territory.
cobblemon.species.narwhail.name: Narwhail
cobblemon.species.narwhail.desc: Its horn is so long, sturdy and as cold as ice. Using its horn, it can stab straight through any material.
cobblemon.species.glachild.name: Glachild
cobblemon.species.frozaiden.name: Frozaiden
cobblemon.species.aurostice.name: Aurostice
cobblemon.species.lunabitt.name: Lunabitt
cobblemon.species.lunabitt.desc: ts ears start to sag downwards when it's exhausted. It recovers its energy when bathed in moonlight.
cobblemon.species.lunabain.name: Lunabain
cobblemon.species.lunabain.desc: It makes rice cakes using the pestle it carries and the mortar attached to its tail. Rice cakes are its favorite food.
cobblemon.species.liepus.name: Liepus
cobblemon.species.liepus.desc: Its body language is the opposite of humans. For example, if it does a task with a smile, it means it hates doing it.
cobblemon.species.liedoro.name: Liedoro
cobblemon.species.liedoro.desc: It is infatuated with the ideal of the « gentleman thief ». It will never steal unless it feels the victim deserves it.
cobblemon.species.rollder.name: Rollder
cobblemon.species.rollder.desc: When it goes into a defensive stance by rolling up its body, attacks bounce off it harmlessly.
cobblemon.species.rotillo.name: Rotillo
cobblemon.species.rotillo.desc: It moves around by rolling in order to protect itself from predators. A herd of them rolling by is an awe-inspiring sight.
cobblemon.species.tentyrant.name: Tentyrant
cobblemon.species.tentyrant.desc: It lives in the pitch-black depths of the ocean, so it uses echolocation instead of its vestigial eyes.
cobblemon.species.sphericoil.name: Sphericoil
cobblemon.species.sphericoil.desc: Despite its similarity to a Master Ball, it's unknown if the two are related in the same way that Voltorb is to Poke Ball.
cobblemon.species.willisp.name: Willisp
cobblemon.species.willisp.desc: A nocturnal Pokemon. Sightings of ghosts or floating fireballs usually turn out to be a wild Willisp.
cobblemon.species.wisplode.name: Wisplode
cobblemon.species.wisplode.desc: The bits of fire that surround this Pokemon's body move as if they each had a mind of their own.
cobblemon.species.plasmox.name: Plasmox
cobblemon.species.plasmox.desc: It enjoys generating electricity. Many people use one as a power source for their homes.
cobblemon.species.blitzune.name: Blitzune
cobblemon.species.blitzune.desc: Its fangs are sharp and coursing with electrical power. A bite will leave the victim shocked and numb.
cobblemon.species.baizeast.name: Baizeast
cobblemon.species.baizeast.desc: A very appreciated Pokemon that prevents sickness for anyone nearby using some sort of mysterious power.
cobblemon.species.mintch.name: Mintch
cobblemon.species.mintch.desc: It builds its nest out of hardened mud. Sometimes, a Taillow will take over the nest for itself.
cobblemon.species.blakjak.name: Blakjak
cobblemon.species.blakjak.desc: The countless eyes on its wings can paralyze with a glare. The flock then surrounds the helpless victim.
cobblemon.species.signetanblakjak.name: Blakjak
cobblemon.species.signetanblakjak.desc: Blakjak has changed its looks entirely. As a result, it can now wield the power of the moon.
cobblemon.species.maneko.name: Maneko
cobblemon.species.maneko.desc: The high body temperatures required to produce flames inside its body often cause it to collapse from heatstroke.
cobblemon.species.bakeko.name: Bakeko
cobblemon.species.bakeko.desc: Those who happen to meet this Pokemon are said to be destined for something. No one knows what, though.
cobblemon.species.clotaku.name: Clotaku
cobblemon.species.clotaku.desc: It prefers a life of solitude. It devotes all its time and energy into mastering a single hobby.
cobblemon.species.ajarimus.name: Ajarimus
cobblemon.species.ajarimus.desc: Unlike Clotaku, it lives in a group. The group wanders around, attacking weaker Pokemon for no good reason.
cobblemon.species.jarmit.name: Jarmit
cobblemon.species.jarmit.desc: It likes to hide in the shadows. It is usually asleep, but no one can stop it once it starts an uproar.
cobblemon.species.hantama.name: Hantama
cobblemon.species.hantama.desc: It can move through solid matter. It is skilled at hunting prey by hiding in the ground or dropping through the ceiling.
cobblemon.species.spelven.name: Spelven
cobblemon.species.spelven.desc: The hatlike object it wears on its head can be removed and used as a shield to block incoming attacks.
cobblemon.species.jamberree.name: Jamberree
cobblemon.species.jamberree.desc: The berry attached to this Pokemon's head is sweet and nutritious. It is a favourite snack among forest Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.strawna.name: Strawna
cobblemon.species.strawna.desc: On cloudy days, its health suffers, affecting its performance in battle. In sunny days, it is very powerful.
cobblemon.species.mornwing.name: Mornwing
cobblemon.species.mornwing.desc: Its ferocious vigilance is its greatest strength. It often attacks the second it sees another Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.guldawn.name: Guldawn
cobblemon.species.guldawn.desc: Its beauty is only surpassed by its incredible power. Its body is as burning hot as its flaming wings.
cobblemon.species.solarisen.name: Solarisen
cobblemon.species.solarisen.desc: When this Pokemon is sick, the flames of its wings get smaller. This might cause it to fall from the sky.
cobblemon.species.dizasol.name: Dizasol
cobblemon.species.folifarig.name: Folifarig
cobblemon.species.snalo.name: Snalo
cobblemon.species.snalo.desc: It is a popular choice of Pokemon amongst office workers due to its power to quickly and efficiently relieve stress.
cobblemon.species.serplant.name: Serplant
cobblemon.species.serplant.desc: This Pokemon's leafy body constantly releases a sweet smell with the ability to calm hearts and clear minds.
cobblemon.species.velvelt.name: Velvelt
cobblemon.species.velvelt.desc: Although it feels like a stuffed toy to the touch, it can't be ripped or damaged nearly as easily.
cobblemon.species.grissly.name: Grissly
cobblemon.species.grissly.desc: Pulling on the ball on the tip of its tail angers it so much that it will go on an unstoppable rampage.
cobblemon.species.psycolt.name: Psycolt
cobblemon.species.psycolt.desc: Beautiful flowers sprout from the ground wherever it treads. Seeing this Pokemon is said to bring good luck.
cobblemon.species.kinegasus.name: Kinegasus
cobblemon.species.kinegasus.desc: Large wings sprout from its back. The elegant attacks it can dish out with them are truly a beautiful sight.
cobblemon.species.yunesis.name: Yunesis
cobblemon.species.yunesis.desc: Its large horn hides the power of the sun within it. When threatened, it unleashes a golden light from its horn.
cobblemon.species.lephan.name: Lephan
cobblemon.species.lephan.desc: It is powerful enough to carry a person on its back. Apparently, the ride it gives is very comfortable.
cobblemon.species.ganerth.name: Ganerth
cobblemon.species.ganerth.desc: A magical deity of the land. There are legends of a Ganerth that broke continents with its rage.
cobblemon.species.rynos.name: Rynos
cobblemon.species.rynos.desc: Its clawed forearms can rotate freely on their joints. This helps it burrow through the ground faster and deeper.
cobblemon.species.feroceros.name: Feroceros
cobblemon.species.feroceros.desc: Its body is so hard and tough that even the latest in weapons technology is powerless against it.
cobblemon.species.violo.name: Violo
cobblemon.species.violo.desc: It plays the trumpet with amazing skill. It sometimes invites Violo and Pianon to listen to its herd's concerts.
cobblemon.species.rumpet.name: Rumpet
cobblemon.species.rumpet.desc: It plays the violin with amazing skill. It sometimes invites Rumpet and Pianon to listen to its herd's concerts.
cobblemon.species.pianon.name: Pianon
cobblemon.species.pianon.desc: It plays the keyboard with amazing skill. It sometimes invites Violo and Rumpet to listen to its herd's concerts.
cobblemon.species.yucarlia.name: Yucarlia
cobblemon.species.yucarlia.desc: It can mimic the laughter of a small child. It uses this to scare people in the dead of night.
cobblemon.species.necrosia.name: Necrosia
cobblemon.species.necrosia.desc: It can easily cut through prey with the sickle attached to its lower body. Don't get too close to it in the wild.
cobblemon.species.stellith.name: Stellith
cobblemon.species.stellith.desc: It powers up when exposed to starlight. It is closely related to meteorites, but the exact connection is a mystery.
cobblemon.species.planite.name: Planite
cobblemon.species.planite.desc: It takes in energy from deep inside the planet and converts it into various types of energy for its own use.
cobblemon.species.kirgicia.name: Kirgicia
cobblemon.species.kirgicia.desc: When it brings the shields at its sides closer to its body, it is protected from attacks from all directions.
cobblemon.species.glamarde.name: Glamarde
cobblemon.species.glamarde.desc: The parts that look like hair can be moved around like arms. It can use them to attack as well.
cobblemon.species.ptervus.name: Ptervus
cobblemon.species.ptervus.desc: A prehistoric Pokemon that was revived by scientists. It flies so fast that it might collide with an airplane.
cobblemon.species.pteriarch.name: Pteriarch
cobblemon.species.pteriarch.desc: It is said to be Aerodactyl's rival. Both Pokemon are referred to as 'The King of the Sky'.
cobblemon.species.grindon.name: Grindon
cobblemon.species.grindon.desc: A prehistoric Pokemon that was revived by scientists. Its two sharp fangs are unbreakable by any known method.
cobblemon.species.scimitooth.name: Scimitooth
cobblemon.species.scimitooth.desc: It viciously attacks prey with its two enormous fangs, landing the final blow by skewering them straight through.
cobblemon.species.tyranos.name: Tyranos
cobblemon.species.tyranos.desc: A prehistoric Pokemon that was revived by scientists. Despite how heavy it looks, it is actually quite fast.
cobblemon.species.pressie.name: Pressie
cobblemon.species.pressie.desc: It likes to float leisurely along the water's surface. When provoked, it will use ice to attack.
cobblemon.species.laquagon.name: Laquagon
cobblemon.species.laquagon.desc: Its head is large and its body is small, so it falls over frequently. Because of this, its face is covered in bruises.
cobblemon.species.dragune.name: Dragune
cobblemon.species.dragune.desc: When it raises its long ears, it can hear even the faintest of sounds, up to a distance of half a mile away.
cobblemon.species.nostratos.name: Nostratos
cobblemon.species.nostratos.desc: A rare Pokemon that lives high above the clouds. It is rarely seen anywhere close to the ground.
cobblemon.species.lylapse.name: Lylapse
cobblemon.species.lylapse.desc: A Pokemon that can distort space. When it runs, its legs move at such a high speed that it appears to be gliding.
cobblemon.species.ganimede.name: Ganimede
cobblemon.species.ganimede.desc: A Pokemon that can confuse the senses. It continues to chase after prey until the prey collapses from exhaustion.
cobblemon.species.nemea.name: Nemea
cobblemon.species.nemea.desc: A Pokemon that can control minds. It tosses its opponents over its head with its single powerful horn.
cobblemon.species.aldina.name: Aldina
cobblemon.species.aldina.desc: It was originally a young human girl. It dreams of one day returning to its human form.
cobblemon.species.almaria.name: Almaria
cobblemon.species.almaria.desc: Aldina's wish to return to human form was partially granted when it evolved into a more human-like shape.
cobblemon.species.asphere.name: Asphere
cobblemon.species.asphere.desc: It has obtained the power of Lyra. The mythical dragon uses the power of fire in this Forme.
cobblemon.species.altair_asphere.name: Asphere
cobblemon.species.altair_asphere.desc1: When the eagle's leading star twinkles, the mythical dragon uses a blizzard to transform itself, becoming the ruler of all ice.
cobblemon.species.sirius_asphere.name: Asphere
cobblemon.species.sirius_asphere.desc1: When the big dog's leading star shines, the mythical dragon uses a thunderbolt to transform itself, becoming the ruler of all lightning.
cobblemon.species.basille.name: Basille
cobblemon.species.basield.name: Basield
cobblemon.species.basield.desc: It constantly generates ozone to clear the air around it. Sickness is rare among those who stay close by.
cobblemon.species.basilux.name: Basilux
cobblemon.species.basilux.desc: It emits electricity from its tail. At night, its tail glows, illuminating the surrounding area.
cobblemon.species.patroleo.name: Patroleo
cobblemon.species.patroleo.desc: It has a passionate heart. It will always protect its Trainer, even at the expense of its own life.
cobblemon.species.gardleon.name: Gardleon
cobblemon.species.gardleon.desc: When it senses danger, its mane erupts into flame, becoming a shield to protect its body.
cobblemon.species.royalert.name: Royalert
cobblemon.species.katuna.name: Katuna
cobblemon.species.katuna.desc: Due to the shape of its body, water flows quickly and easily past it. This makes it a fast swimmer.
cobblemon.species.maelstream.name: Maelstream
cobblemon.species.maelstream.desc: When it swims at high speed, it can't see its surroundings, so it often collides with walls or other Pokemon.
cobblemon.species.skelachone.name: Skelachone
cobblemon.species.skelachone.desc: Its body has been eaten away, decreasing its weight drastically. It can now move at amazing speeds.
cobblemon.species.cheshile.name: Cheshile
cobblemon.species.cheshile.desc: It loves to eat. Its food preferences change greatly depending on its mood, making it difficult to raise.
cobblemon.species.cheshess.name: Cheshess
cobblemon.species.cheshess.desc: It has the ability to melt into the shadows in dark places. It can speak human languages fluently.
cobblemon.species.chessire.name: Chessire
cobblemon.species.chessire.desc: Groups of Chessire gather on midsummer nights. The next morning, only a pile of bones can be found.
cobblemon.species.rivird.name: Rivird
cobblemon.species.rivird.desc: It can swim underwater for minutes at a time. However, it can only fly for a few minutes either.
cobblemon.species.mingola.name: Mingola
cobblemon.species.mingola.desc: It can use its long and soft neck as a spring to plunge its head forward, causing huge damage as the beak hits.
cobblemon.species.pachirikku.name: Pachirikku
cobblemon.species.pachirikku.desc: When it sees a Pachirisu that is running low on electricity, it rubs cheeks with it in order to share its own stored charge.
cobblemon.species.pumpkid.name: Pumpkid
cobblemon.species.pumpkid.desc: The pumpkin is part of its body. When it senses danger, it hides its lower half and pretends to be a normal pumpkin.
cobblemon.species.wikkin.name: Wikkin
cobblemon.species.wikkin.desc: It carries a single leaf with it at all times. With one wave of the leaf, all surrounding Pokemon start to smile.
cobblemon.species.rougella.name: Rougella
cobblemon.species.rougella.desc: It now has a much slimmer figure, so its dancing is much more flexible. Anyone watching its dance will be paralyzed.
cobblemon.species.tanuking.name: Tanuking
cobblemon.species.tanuking.desc: The well-liked leader of a herd of Takuni and Percussoon. It is highly knowledgeable.
cobblemon.species.switza.name: Switza
cobblemon.species.switza.desc: Its entire body is edible, even for herbivores. It slowly regenerates lost pieces of its body in cold places.
cobblemon.species.purimodo.name: Purimodo
cobblemon.species.shivermin.name: Shivermin
cobblemon.species.shivermin.desc: It constantly travels in search of snow. A Shivermin sighting is a sign that snow will fall nearby sometime soon.
cobblemon.species.nymphrost.name: Nymphrost
cobblemon.species.nymphrost.desc: It drinks melted snow. The sight of it elegantly fluttering through the sky hasearned it the nickname 'The Snow Fairy'.
cobblemon.species.conductot.name: Conductot
cobblemon.species.conductot.desc: Its beautiful singing voice can calm down quick-tempered Pokemon and put an end to most conflicts.
cobblemon.species.ledybulk.name: Ledybulk
cobblemon.species.ledybulk.desc: A Ledian with a body specialized for hand-to-hand combat. Its floating feet flutter freely through the air.
cobblemon.species.modra.name: Modra
cobblemon.species.modra.desc: When it senses danger, it curves its body upward at nearly 90 degrees. It injects poison into prey through its fangs.
cobblemon.species.komoragon.name: Komoragon
cobblemon.species.komoragon.desc: The purple patterns on it body contain toxins. The larger the pattern, the more powerful the poison.
cobblemon.species.lilynary.name: Lilynary
cobblemon.species.lilynary.desc: Recent scientific discoveries suggest that plants and berries will grow faster in the presence of a Lilynary.
cobblemon.species.kaminary.name: Kaminary
cobblemon.species.kaminary.desc: According to legend, the howl of a Kaminary will bless all nearby people with eternal good luck.
cobblemon.species.grieflame.name: Grieflame
cobblemon.species.grieflame.desc: Looking closely into its face during the night will reveal images of the Distortion World.
cobblemon.species.scorment.name: Scorment
cobblemon.species.scorment.desc: It takes people with deep sadness in their hearts into another world that they can never escape.
cobblemon.species.rubball.name: Rubball
cobblemon.species.rubball.desc: This Pokemon falls from ceiling in caves. A group of them can cause an earthquake by falling all at once.
cobblemon.species.phantonate.name: Phantonate
cobblemon.species.phantonate.desc: Despite its ghostly appearance, it is completely solid. It brings the wandering souls of Pokemon to their rightful place.
cobblemon.species.strawick.name: Strawick
cobblemon.species.strawick.desc: A Pokemon born from the pent-up grudges of humans. Seeing one will instill an instinctual fear in people.
cobblemon.species.strawicked.name: Strawicked
cobblemon.species.strawicked.desc: It holds the opponent between its large and sturdy hands, then stomps on it with its main pillar to attack.
cobblemon.species.puffume.name: Puffume
cobblemon.species.puffume.desc: It is always surrounded by an invisible vortex of air a few inches thicker than its visible body.
cobblemon.species.turblimp.name: Turblimp
cobblemon.species.turblimp.desc: It exales a stange gas from its mouth. The gas is powerful enough to paralyze anything that inhales it.
cobblemon.species.yolkid.name: Yolkid
cobblemon.species.yolkid.desc: Its inner, pink body is weak, so it covers it with a hard eggshell. It rolls around to move.
cobblemon.species.corenom.name: Corenom
cobblemon.species.corenom.desc: The shell attached to its tail can be used for defense. The larger the shell, the more powerful its attacks are.
cobblemon.species.coropper.name: Coropper
cobblemon.species.coropper.desc: Its powerful hind legs allow it to jump to great heights. It can leap over the Sky Pillar in a single bound.
cobblemon.species.coruda.name: Coruda
cobblemon.species.coruda.desc: It emits light from its body, so its body temperature is always high. The shell on its back is its weak point.
cobblemon.species.coraga.name: Coraga
cobblemon.species.coraga.desc: A Pokemon with five different heads. The head covered with a shell is the only one capable of intelligent thought.
cobblemon.species.lizzle.name: Lizzle
cobblemon.species.lizzle.desc: Since it loses moisture quickly, it developed the ability to summon rain to protect itself from dehydration.
cobblemon.species.drizzlob.name: Drizzlob
cobblemon.species.drizzlob.desc: Some say that its ability to attract rain clouds comes from the orb on its tail, but no one knows for sure.
cobblemon.species.droudrop.name: Droudrop
cobblemon.species.droudrop.desc: Since it gets sick if its body fluids accumulate, it summons the light of the sun to remove the moisture.
cobblemon.species.droudrum.name: Droudrum
cobblemon.species.droudrum.desc: Due to its ability to intensify the sunlight, this Pokemon can help grow berries or heat up cold places.
cobblemon.species.clouff.name: Clouff
cobblemon.species.clouff.desc: It can manipulate clouds in order to calm stormy weather or end droughts. Its body has a fluffy texture.
cobblemon.species.cloubus.name: Cloubus
cobblemon.species.cloubus.desc: By harnessing the power of the clouds, it can produce mild electrical shocks or shoot small jets of water.
cobblemon.species.dvaarak.name: Dvaarak
cobblemon.species.dvaarak.desc: It uses the drill on its nose to dig burrows and pitfalls. Its eyes are so weak, it can barely see anything.
cobblemon.species.doodloo.name: Doodloo
cobblemon.species.doodloo.desc: What looks like a face is actually scribbles drawn with berry juice. Its real face is on its stomach.
cobblemon.species.billserk.name: Billserk
cobblemon.species.sableater.name: Sableater
cobblemon.species.sableater.desc: It dislikes light, so it tends to stay in the darkness deep inside caves. It's jewels can sense light.
cobblemon.species.jawile.name: Jawile
cobblemon.species.jawile.desc: When it is mistaken for a weak Pokemon and approached, it turns around and bites into the foe with its huge jaws.
cobblemon.species.pinchor.name: Pinchor
cobblemon.species.pinchor.desc: It bites captured prey with it's large mouth. The wings on it's back allow it to fly for a short time.
cobblemon.species.adnokana.name: Adnokana
cobblemon.species.adnokana.desc: Its thick hide is as hard as steel. Pokemon that attack it may end up breaking their own bones.
cobblemon.species.cheauking.name: Cheauking
cobblemon.species.cheauking.desc: A rare set of three Koffing combined into a single Pokemon. Its intense smell can cause people to pass out.
cobblemon.species.guppyre.name: Guppyre
cobblemon.species.guppyre.desc: It can survive in molten lava. It can even swim through lava as quickly as it swims through water.
cobblemon.species.diaduna.name: Diaduna
cobblemon.species.diaduna.desc: This Pokemon was born to battle. When two males see each other, they will immediately start fighting.
cobblemon.species.relicore.name: Relicore
cobblemon.species.relicore.desc: Its head is as hard as rock in order to withstand the pressure of the seafloor. Its tackles are incredibly powerful.
cobblemon.species.fujinel.name: Fujinel
cobblemon.species.fujinel.desc: It is not very skilled at handling fire, so it sometimes gets burned by the same fire it produces.
cobblemon.species.sabrinel.name: Sabrinel
cobblemon.species.sabrinel.desc: It glides by spreading the membrane between its front and back legs. While gliding, it sprinkles flame below it.
cobblemon.species.smalmon.name: Smalmon
cobblemon.species.smalmon.desc: By constantly adjusting the angle of its fins, it can swim against the current in rivers and oceans.
cobblemon.species.trojalmon.name: Trojalmon
cobblemon.species.trojalmon.desc: A large colony of Smalmon make their home inside its mouth. It occasionally uses them to attack.
cobblemon.species.punchild.name: Punchild
cobblemon.species.punchild.desc: It grasps its own head in its large fist, then throws. This allows it to travel large distances upward.
cobblemon.species.combound.name: Combound
cobblemon.species.combound.desc: The combo attacks it can perform with the fists growing on its head are truly a magnificent sight.
cobblemon.species.wombaton.name: Wombaton
cobblemon.species.wombaton.desc: The big bone club it wields is not only useful for attacking. It can also be used to crush berries.
cobblemon.species.sandrill.name: Sandrill
cobblemon.species.sandrill.desc: Its forepaws transformed into drills to dig more efficiently. When angered, the sharp spikes on its head stand on end.
cobblemon.species.yulfoe.name: Yulfoe
cobblemon.species.yulfoe.desc: It is rumored that the effects of the Hoenn Catastrophe caused this Pokemon to fly to this planet from outer space.
cobblemon.species.galaxia.name: Galaxia
cobblemon.species.sealkie.name: Sealkie
cobblemon.species.sealkie.desc: After it retracts its real face, it can use the tusks on its false mouth to bite just as hard as if the mouth was real.
cobblemon.species.selody.name: Selody
cobblemon.species.selody.desc: It lulls its opponents into their guards down with its beautiful singing voice. It can move on land by bouncing.
cobblemon.species.rooten.name: Rooten
cobblemon.species.rooten.desc: It finds a suitable place to live, then spreads its roots into a soil. It can cut off the roots if it needs to leave.
cobblemon.species.rudebarb.name: Rudebarb
cobblemon.species.rudebarb.desc: It only lives in soil with plenty of nutrition. The presence of Rudebarb is a reliable indicotor of good farmland.
cobblemon.species.dislichen.name: Dislichen
cobblemon.species.dislichen.desc: It prefers dark and moist places. It is full of vitality, but still chooses to sit around doing absolutely nothing.
cobblemon.species.lumoss.name: Lumoss
cobblemon.species.lumoss.desc: If it absorbs even the slightest bit of light, its entire body starts to glow brightly.
cobblemon.species.combant.name: Combant
cobblemon.species.combant.desc: A hard worker that is always busy. Arincess have a preference for the Combant that can work the hardest.
cobblemon.species.arincess.name: Arincess
cobblemon.species.arincess.desc: Usually as hard of a worker as Combant. However, some have rotten attitudes and force Combant to do all the work.
cobblemon.species.ranconette.name: Ranconette
cobblemon.species.ranconette.desc: A Banette's soul that took control of a marionette. It is skilled at manipulating its opponents psychologically.
cobblemon.species.carnivice.name: Carnivice
cobblemon.species.carnivice.desc: When it notices prey underwater or underground, it grabs it with it's tentacles, then eats it.
cobblemon.species.toxroach.name: Toxroach
cobblemon.species.toxroach.desc: It feeds on human garbage. If you see on Toxroach, there are probably another hundred nearby.
cobblemon.species.cocrogue.name: Cocrogue
cobblemon.species.cocrogue.desc: The attacks dealt by its four arms can't be matched in power by any Pokemon with only two arms.
cobblemon.species.valentide.name: Valentide
cobblemon.species.valentide.desc: The power of love caused it to grow. Seeing one is a sign that you will soon meet the love of your life.
cobblemon.species.shretainer.name: Shretainer
cobblemon.species.shretainer.desc: When it senses danger, it emits all kinds of powders from its body. Its head is surprisingly hard.
cobblemon.species.samushrai.name: Samushrai
cobblemon.species.samushrai.desc: It bows to defend its trainer even at the risk of its own life. This vow is a considerable pride for it.
cobblemon.species.ambilade.name: Ambilade
cobblemon.species.ambilade.desc: It's tail is incredibly sharp. Strong Pokemon used the tail as a weapon in the Great Pokemon War.
cobblemon.species.mandiblade.name: Mandiblade
cobblemon.species.mandiblade.desc: It tries cutting every object it comes across. A sharp-bladed Mandiblade will leave only sliced debris in its wake.
cobblemon.species.mercenade.name: Mercenade
cobblemon.species.mercenade.desc: It always fights fairly, no matter what. It spars with its comrades in friendly one-on-one matches.
cobblemon.species.terubim.name: Terubim
cobblemon.species.sunny_terubim.name: Terubim
cobblemon.species.rainy_terubim.name: Terubim
cobblemon.species.snowy_terubim.name: Terubim
cobblemon.species.blizentork.name: Blizentork
cobblemon.species.blizentork.desc: It goes around giving out food to hungry Pokemon. Because of this, some call it 'The Pokemon Santa Claus'.
cobblemon.species.galavagos.name: Galavagos
cobblemon.species.galavagos.desc: When it senses danger, it blows out huge amounts of smoke, cloaking it's body entirely from any predators.
cobblemon.species.auldsparce.name: Auldsparce
cobblemon.species.auldsparce.desc: An unusual Pokemon that lives deep underground. It almost never shows itself to humans.
cobblemon.species.rduckulus.name: R'duckulus
cobblemon.species.rduckulus.desc: When two Farfetch'd get into a fight, the winner takes the loser's stalk and then evolves.
cobblemon.species.roytsar.name: Roytsar
cobblemon.species.roytsar.desc: It produces a mysterious energy that can cause even the most ill-tempered of people to instantly calm down.
cobblemon.species.gatanoia.name: Gatanoia
cobblemon.species.gatanoia.desc: Anyone who makes eye contact with it will be turned to stone instantly. It is widely feared for this.
cobblemon.species.lukewran.name: Lukewran
cobblemon.species.lukewran.desc: It lives deep in volcanic caverns. It is skilled at using its cross- shaped claws to fight.
cobblemon.species.capyba.name: Capyba
cobblemon.species.capyba.desc: Their body hair is soft and fluffy. They can hide a berry within their hair.
cobblemon.species.capiland.name: Capiland
cobblemon.species.wallachy.name: Wallachy
cobblemon.species.tawachy.name: Tawachy
cobblemon.species.ploviey.name: Ploviey
cobblemon.species.ploviey.desc: They move with toddling because they are not good at flying. Its appearance is very cute.
cobblemon.species.hyorhythm.name: Hyorhythm
cobblemon.species.tombeat.name: Tombeat
cobblemon.species.birarchy.name: Birarchy
cobblemon.species.wochecho.name: Wochecho

cobblemon.species.baburun.name: Baburun
cobblemon.species.baburun.desc: It keeps to itself. It uses its HORN to sense and avoid DANGER
cobblemon.species.garakasago.name: Garakasago
cobblemon.species.supaina.name: Supaina
cobblemon.species.baretta.name: Baretta

cobblemon.species.sukabi.name: Sukabi
cobblemon.species.kusomarume.name: Kusomarume
cobblemon.species.hikarabe.name: Hikarabe
cobblemon.species.hazekonko.name: Hazekonko
cobblemon.species.honetto.name: Honetto
cobblemon.species.mameden.name: Mameden
cobblemon.species.daiomu.name: Daiomu
cobblemon.species.yukidaru.name: Yukidaru
cobblemon.species.doraiasu.name: Doraiasu
cobblemon.species.elidon.name: Elidon
cobblemon.species.suripitto.name: Suripitto
cobblemon.species.karakoron.name: Karakoron
cobblemon.species.demini.name: Demini
cobblemon.species.demiddul.name: Demiddul
cobblemon.species.demorigan.name: Demorigan
cobblemon.species.arugari.name: Arugari
cobblemon.species.anoga.name: Anoga
cobblemon.species.kasodan.name: Kasodan
cobblemon.species.mouldon.name: Mouldon
cobblemon.species.mouldon.desc: Mouldon live in a symbiotic relationship with the mould growing on them, giving them more power. Fossils of this Pokémon species have been found before, which show no traces of this mould.
cobblemon.species.fungrove.name: Fungrove
cobblemon.species.fungrove.desc: The mould and mushrooms on its back have grown a bit larger upon evolution. It protects the mould from harm, and in return, the mould and mushrooms give it a significant energy boost.
cobblemon.species.saprodon.name: Saprodon
cobblemon.species.saprodon.desc: Its back has grown tougher and larger, allowing the mould and mushrooms to grow even more. When its offspring hatch from their Eggs, its mushrooms will release spores that can grow on their backs.
cobblemon.species.gastrohm.name: Gastrohm
cobblemon.species.gastrohm.desc: Gastrohm's feelers contain special cells that deliver a strong shock when touched. It can charge the feelers to make them glow, which is how it communicates with others in the damp caves it inhabits.
cobblemon.species.mollectric.name: Mollectric
cobblemon.species.mollectric.desc: Its feet are extra sticky, allowing it to climb the walls of the cave it lives in. When it finds prey, it will try to touch the prey's nerves with its feelers, zapping them and leaving them helpless.
cobblemon.species.nudibolt.name: Nudibolt
cobblemon.species.nudibolt.desc: The many feelers emerging from its back have triple the amount of shock-cells compared to the feelers on its face. The glowing colors it creates when it charges its feelers are quite mesmerizing.
cobblemon.species.enchantowl.name: Enchantowl
cobblemon.species.enchantowl.desc: The hairs of its beard are extremely thick, making for a good rope. It is not wise to test this, though, as Enchantowl can cast deadly curses.
cobblemon.species.paintta.name: Paintta
cobblemon.species.piscasso.name: Piscasso
cobblemon.species.piscasso.desc: Added Nov 11 2021 Etymology: Pisces/piscine + Picasso Evo line: Complete Habitat: Seafloors, Coral Reefs, Docks, and Beaches
cobblemon.species.raveclem.name: Raveclem
cobblemon.species.raveclem.desc: When Raveclem are in combat, they surprise their opponent with a dazzling light show. Some Raveclem are used in set designs because of the unique patterns of light they can emit.
cobblemon.species.eyeziant.name: Eyeziant
cobblemon.species.ghostea.name: Ghostea
cobblemon.species.snooz.name: Snooz
cobblemon.species.snooz.desc: Added Oct 28 2021. Etymology: corruption of snooze
cobblemon.species.curstar.name: Curstar
cobblemon.species.curstar.desc: It can be found crawling on the ocean floor, its singular eye piercing through the darkness. Anything that touches its tendrils is stung and dragged to its mouth, where it is promptly devoured.
cobblemon.species.nostroot.name: Nostroot
